item.text: @#/ /phal chen ca pa bzhugs so//
shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/
bam po brgyad cu lnga pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig
rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu bskyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po
byang chub la 'khod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed cing / byang
chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed
cing | byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la
'khod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri la rnam par lta zhing / byang chub sems
dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /yid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog cing / byang chub sems
dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /ji ltar mthun pa'i lus dang spyod lam yongs su ston cing / byang chub
sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed cing / byang chub
sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dag
pa'i gnas yang dag par len cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /bdag gi
dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang
chub la 'khod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po
byang chub la 'dug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub kyi mchog la 'khod
nas kyang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu 'byung ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de la snying po byang
chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/ phyag
g.yas pa brkyang zhing / kye ded dpon chen po/ rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig /ces gsung brjod de/
'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob pa yang dag par mdzad de/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la kun nas bskor cing mchod pa'i las rnam par phye ba
rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
la| 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtswa dang / gel pa dang / sdong po dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yod ko lta ste/ snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'dud cing phyag
'tshal te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i tshe yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar
rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ rgya mtsho mchog gi dam pa dri ma med cing kun nas snang la 'od gsal ba'i sa'i snying po la
'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen po kun nas yog par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos
drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba
shin tu rgya chen po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad du 'byung ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung
ba'i chos bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes mchog gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam
pa dang / dbang po dang / spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' rnams la blo shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa
dang | dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la
'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las dus thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing / ye shes chen po chags pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan
par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams
te| byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub mchog la gnas pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ don rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang dag par
mthong nas/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
'byams klas pa na 'thab mo dang / g.yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /yid gnyis dang / the tshom du gyur pa'i mi dang / lha rnams kyi yid gnyis dang / the tshom gcad pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /bdud kyi sde
yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /'thab mo dang / g.yul la mos pa'i lha dang / mi rnams kun nas bsdu ba dang / kun
nas 'dus pa'i lha dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu la thub pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba
ston to/ /sems can gzhan mos shing spro bar bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /snying po byang chub kyi
bar gyi bdud kyi las yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /nyon mongs
pa'i stobs kyis nyams smad cing stobs med par byas pa yongs su bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang / byams pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir bdud
'dul ba ston to/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag tu chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba
ston to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ don bcu po de dag gi dbang mngon pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
bdud dang / las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtse ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byams klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par
bsags pa yin/ chos snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/ sems can
thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang / dbyangs su ldan pa yin/ byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog por byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da
ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yin/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin/
shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i
stobs dang ldan pa yin/ zag pa zad pa shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcu bskor te/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar mi 'jigs pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang
dag par shes pa bzhi'i sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang / bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su
song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa med cing blta bar dka' la yo ba med cing / sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa
dang | sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / legs par spyad pas bskor
ba'o| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med pa dang /
mngon par chags pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sems
can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul
bzhin du mi 'khrul ba dang / dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang / tshig gi dbang dmigs par dka' ba dang / ye shes
kyi dbang tshig bzhin du khong du chud par byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa med pa dang / mngon par med par 'gyur bar 'gyur
ro| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang
gzigs nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed mi rtag pa yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dus byas
thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad dang 'bral ba yang dag par bstan
pa dang / gzugs kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang mi rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang / rnam
par 'gyur ba'i mthus phyir mi ldog par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur mi rung zhing dbang bsgyur du med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sa gsum
gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa
dang | kun 'byung zhing 'jigs pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi
'phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/ dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te/ 'dul ba thams cad shin tu dul nas/ byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i
sras| don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya
ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o/ /don tshad med pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
spyod pa dang / smon lam chen po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o/ /sems can gang gis 'di thos par gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par gyur nas kyang nan
tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
ro| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi/ nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /
kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas/ don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog/ chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa/ 'jig
rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/ chos
thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di/ rim gror byas te/
mnyan par bya'o/ /blang bar bya'o/ /yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /yongs su bzung nas kyang nges pas rtogs pa'i sgos yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub
pa la brtson par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no/ /'jig
rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos kyi rnam grangs
'di'i chos nyid thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa rnams rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams
cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan
nas gsung brjod pa/ kye rgyal ba'i bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i
le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug
pa| 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/
chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa
'di bstan pa ni rgyal ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byang ba ste/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / mthus mos pa'i chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di legs par bshad de/ nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/ /kye rgyal ba'i bu/
khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir/ nged kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas
nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa//
gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras/ /gang rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa/ /dpe
zla med pa de dag rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyi rtse cig mnyan par byos/ /gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas mi gnas pa/ /gang dag nyon mongs
bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang / /gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan mi gnas pa/ /de dag 'jig rten rab tu dga'
bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya/ /gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang / /gang rnams de dag 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan
zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po/ /gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba/ /'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par
bya| |gang rnams de dag bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las brgal te thams cad dbang byed pa/ /'gro ba thams cad dag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston/ /sems
bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa/ /de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya/ /srid pa'i rgyud na
sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye dang rga bas gzir ba dang / /'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas/ /de dag thar bar bya phyir
snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas ye shes mchog 'god pa/ /de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyi rtse cig mnyan par byos/ /sbyin dang
tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par rtsen/ /shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / /dga'
ba'i chos la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa/ /de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyi de dag nyon/ /gang rnams
de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus skem pa/ /gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshol phyir srog la lta ba med par gyur pa dang / /gang rnams de dag sems can
phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba mi tshol ba/ /byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya/ /rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re
res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi/ /de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang / /dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan
par mi nus 'on kyang go/ sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos/ /gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar
po 'phel byed kyang / /mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems med mi dman chos tshol ngoms par yong mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba kun nas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing
sdong ste/ /ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin/ /byams pa rlan yin snying rje rtsa ba dga' ba sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste/ /ze ba ye shes dri ni
tshul khrims bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dga' byed pa/ /de dang de dag pad+mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos
'gro ba rnams la snang / /sa bon mos pa sa gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dang ni rtsa ba ste/ /sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga/ /bsam
gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste/ /chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs/ /rim gyis
dkar yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang pa ste/ /dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge/ stong pa don dam sul
dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mig gnyis te/ /de dag seng ge lta bur bdag med sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed/ /'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog
dgon nyon mongs mi bzad 'khyams gyur te/ /bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin cing gti mug mdongs gyur pa/ /lam ni rab stor mi mkhas
sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni/ /lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god/ /'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun
pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing / /yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba/ /sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa
yi nad pa kun gso zhing / /nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston/ /rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dgar byed 'gro la chos ston pa/ /sdig
pa spong la dge la bsnyen cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces/ /rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba/ /rgya chen byang
chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor/ /tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa'i ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon/ /ye shes rno ba'i
gzhu can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa/ /chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yin/ /'khor lo mchog rnams
bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms/ /ye shes chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan/ /byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen
gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge /de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs med
bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i
bsam pa mi sgul ba/ /gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis bltas/ /
lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yas bsam pa mi phyed de/ /
bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mi bskyod rab brtan pa/ /de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar ba dag las zlog par byed/ /byams pa'i sprin
rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu zhing ldog /thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog/ tha dad yang dag shes dang
tshul khrims yan lag brgyad ldan chu yi char 'bebs pa/ /de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags/ /shes
rab dga' dang khrel yod dag ni 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /ye shes shing thags yin te thar pa'i sgo phye dran pa de dag sgo ba yin/ /bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste
shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa/ /srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis mi thul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mchog shing la rab
'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan/ /gshog pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje mig gnyis yin/ /ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thub med mkha'
lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra/ /srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don cing lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god/ /tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs
ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba mdzes/ /'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms shing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skem par byed/ /stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems
can pad+mo yongs su rgyas byed pa/ /de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun du 'byung / /chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis blta na
mdzes pa ste/ /nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan/ /sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par stan/ /
de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'/ /chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan/ /ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba
thabs ni mig ste chos la dbang chen bsgyur gnas pa/ /lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyis blta ba'i dbang po ste/ /chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag
chos kyi dbang po yin/ /srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun dbang po/ /byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams
la mos/ /srid pa gsum po kun du tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go 'byed pa/ /de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel/ /'khor las rab tu 'das
shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang / /phyir ldog mi 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la/ /chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten
dam pa ye shes phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang / /nam mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang
rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal ba/ /'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la'ang gnas pa med pa ste/ /'gro ba kun tu spyod pa
dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu mi gnas pa/ /de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra/ /de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa lhar
'gro ba kun gyi gsos/ /chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rje nyon mongs me ni rab tu sel/ /de dang de dag ye shes mes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bsal/ /ston
pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu/ /de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro bar dbul yang sel/ /de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum
na lta ba kun tu 'joms/ /de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed/ /ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin//
de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtse/ /phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgon la gnas/ /de dang de dag tshul
khrims ma nyams skyon med rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhim/ /de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyis ni bag chags dag/ gdugs 'dra de dang de dag stobs kyi bla
res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed/ /ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal mtshan snyol/ /de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye
shes kun tu 'phags/ /gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed/ /theg pa 'dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin//
de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas/ /de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'/ /klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de dag
sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs/ /de dang de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dum war mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon/ /dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi
sde rnams 'khrugs/ /mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud/ /de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can thams cad lam yang ston/ /de
dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan ded cing lam rgyun rjes su 'gro /de dang de dag zam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol/ /gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes
gangs chen mtsho thob byed/ /de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god/ /de dag skyed mos tshal gyi dga' brtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston/ /de
dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal med khang dag pa/ /mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel/ /
sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so/ /de dag sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel/ /yang dag sangs rgyas lta
bur gzhan min yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed/ /de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas/ /de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes
'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs/ /zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston/ /de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen gyi spyod
yul shes/ /de dang de dag tshad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa med/ /de dag ye shes mi 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes/ /gang na
gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa/ /kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing ming dbyangs rjes su song ba yin/ /gzugs rnams
kun las 'das shing ming dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston/ /de dag mthu ni 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun du brjod par mi nus so/ /gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan
thob cing dngos bral dngos po med pa'i chos gnas shing / /yod dang med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can/ /thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa
ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min/ /de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya/ /chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa lta bur rab
rtogs nas/ /mkhas pas sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed/ /sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i/ /
byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam pa med pa legs par grags/ /lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston/ /sems
med yid med sems kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun du de dag ston/ /khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par rjod byed kyang / /'gro ba dag gis sgra skad
ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu rjod/ /nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang bsgyur te/ /brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing
sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston/ /de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes/ /'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig
rten sna tshogs ston/ /de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthun gnas
pa ji snyed pa/ /thams cad kun du skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med/ /rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste/ /mkhas
pa kun la dbang bsgyur de dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing / /me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil snyan gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams/ /thams cad mkhyen la mchod
pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing / /mkhas pa bsam pa thag pas lus kyi 'du byed mchod pa dam pa kun du ston/ /mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi
drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs med de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed/ /chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob
gyur cing / /blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldang ba ston pa byed kyang zad pa med/ /'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i chos
dang gzugs spos mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston/ /sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston/ /'gro ba thams cad la ni
'du shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa med/ /'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro ba ston/ /la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag
kyang ston/ /la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rnams/ /la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa
rtogs med de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston/ /la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/ /la lar nyan thos gzugs su
gyur cing la la dag tu rang rgyal gzugs su gyur/ /bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' bas spyod las ldog pa med/ /de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar
tshangs par 'gyur/ /de dag la lar lha yi bu mo brgyas bskor la lar gcig pu spyod pa ston/ /la lar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur/ /la lar
chos kyi dra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston/ /la lar bud med sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur/ /la lar 'dod pa'i longs
spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa byed/ /la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe yis dang la lar rgan dang byis par ston/ /de dag spyod pa bsams na skye bo myos par 'gyur
te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur/ /la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas pa ston/ /la lar mngal zhugs la lar
rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu slob/ /la lar bud med tshogs kyi dbus gnas la lar ting
'dzin la lar mngon par 'byung / /la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs/ /la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhing la lar sna tshogs
chos rnams yongs su tshol/ /la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang / /byang chub don du spyod pa dag gis tshogs rnams las kyang phyir
ldog ma yin no/ /bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag /khyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de
bzhin ston pa byed/ /'gro ba thams cad la yang rtog dang mi rtog rtog pa'i yul rnams thams cad ston/ /gsog pa med cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kun kyang
rab tu ston/ /gang phyir rgyal ba nye rgyal de dag nyi tshe'i phyogs med kun na bzhugs pas na/ /'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul gcig steng du mthong / /
sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrubs dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong / /de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur/ /de
ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes/ /sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa rnams/ /de dag 'gro ba
gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun du ston pa byed/ /bslab pa 'di yi phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed/ /dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang
dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas/ /'gro bar skal ba yod dang skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo skor ba byed/ /dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun
gnas pa dang / /dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po brtan pa'ang rab tu shes/ /de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang
shes| |sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yi sems spyod da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yod ma yin/ /ma nor spyod pa
shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed/ /de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs med pa dag /sems gcig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub
mchog tu kun mkhyen rnam sangs rgya/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phye rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas/ /sems kyi tshul shes
sems med rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god/ /rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags/ /sems
bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang 'gro/ de ltar ye shes dbang bsgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang / /skra
rgyud shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med/ /'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang / /sgyu ma kun
btsal gzugs su mi dmigs gzugs yod ma yin par yang dmigs pa med/ /de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams/ /sprul
pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas shing rab tu ston/ /nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams/ /ma rnyogs chu rnams
ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin/ /de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams/ /'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi
yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin/ /la la gnyid log rmi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed/ /lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma
zad| |de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te/ /skad cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad mi 'gyur/ /ri yi dbang po'i
ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra/ /kun nas sgra yi sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing g.yo ba med/ /de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu
mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag /rtog pa med par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston/ /dpyid zla dag gi smig rgyu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur
ni 'du shes nas/ /de nas chu rnyed mi 'gyur btung du med cing je bas je skom rnams 'phel ba/ /de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba'i rnams/ /
shes pas rtog nas sems can 'du shes bya med phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel/ /gzugs ni dbu ba lta bur khyu mchog ston te tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra/ /'du shes thams cad
smig rgyu lta bur rag las 'dus byas chu skyes shing dang 'dra/ /sems ni sgyu 'dra bsgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston/ /de ltar phung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang
bsgyur dag ni de la gnas pa med/ /skye mched stong pa'i rang bzhin dbang med 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun du 'byin byed dang / /khams ni chos kyi dbyings
mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston/ /dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston/ /de ltar de dag chos tshul rnam par
dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa med/ /'ong ba med cing phyogs su 'gro ba med la rgyud du gnas pa med pa yi/ /nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang las las sdug
bsngal de ltar lam gsum du/ /rkyen la rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med las rab tu 'das pa yi/ /yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la gnas
pa rab tu ston/ /skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang ston/ /'dod dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston par
byed| |sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin
ston| |gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin/ /khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun du 'gro ba thob gyur pa/ /mig
gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag /sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la dmigs pa med/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'gro ba kun du mngon sum chos bzhed de/ /nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mi mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par gyur pa med/ /'byung ba thugs su chud
pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad/ /'di yi gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa med/ /'khrul pa mi mnga' lam las g.yo ba'ang mi
mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste/ /mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang nyams pa med pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mdzad sdom pa
gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba/ /'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa med brnyes pa/ /chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa
'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog /de dag yon tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya/ /de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad
par mi nus te/ /'on kyang ji ltar sa la sa rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa
rnams/ /spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing / /tshul khrims mi g.yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba
thams cad yongs su smin par byed/ /lung bstan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed/ /sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can
sems dang zhing la sems pa byed/ /bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med/ /gzungs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams
thob cing yang dag don gyis rgyal/ /bstan pa mtshungs med sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang rgya/ /sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan
spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed/ /snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog rten byang chub dam pa sbyong bar byed dang ldan/ /brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i
pha rol phyin gyur pas/ /khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis
chos mchog ston byed pa/ /yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur/ /dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa med
pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /ye shes mchog dang de bzhin gshegs sprul sgrub cing byang chub zhi ba nye bar 'gro /mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byams klas byin rlabs shes pas
dbugs phyin rab tu thob/ /zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bsal bas mkhas pa rnams/ /ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing
rnam phye pha rol phyin/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya/ /ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas
rnam par rtsen/ /rig pa'i snang ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra/ /gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa
po| |'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo ba med/ /bsam pa shin tu shes pas bstan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin 'gyur bas/ /mkhas pa
dag ni dag cing sbyangs ba'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis/ /'gro ba dag dang mi mtshungs zhum med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra/ /ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra
dang yon tan mi zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod/ /de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas/ /shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro
ba kun na thub pa med/ /byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas/ /sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thob
nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o/ /rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul ba rnams la mkhas pas na/ /zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la
rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rgyud la gnas/ /lus dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te/ /'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma
mang po ston/ /mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par rtse/ /khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis
thub pa med/ /mkhas pa 'jigs pa med dang bag tsha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan/ /sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes
pa'i lus dang ldan/ /de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge /de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs shing las ni mchog kyang
byed| |dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po'i ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu
gnas/ /bsam bdag cing g.yo rgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur/ /mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston/ /bag chags
thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin/ /nan tan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya/ /bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag
skyon med gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang 'thob/ /mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni yon tan sgo nas grags/ /mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa
med par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed/ /ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston/ /spyod pa lag pa lta bu dag dang ldan pa lto yin
snying po ye shes mchog /snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin/ /shes rab mgo ste chos rtogs mig yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba
yin| |tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun bzhi byed sna yin te/ /spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin/ /spyod pa rgyu
ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin/ /tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags med dam pa spyod yul lo/ /gang gis de dag
snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yul/ /sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings//
sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyems pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / /bzod pa mi 'khrugs brtson 'grus mi ldog dbang bsgyur ba ni bsam gtan dam
pa yin| |rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren/ /skyo ba med snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mongs gnas las btang yang
snyoms/ /don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos/ /ye shes tshogs ni ral gri rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste/ /'gro ba rnams la
thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med/ /nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad/ /rgyal ba rnams
kyi 'phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin/ /nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spangs te rtag tu ye shes kyi yang bya ba byed/ /bdud rnams byin
gyis brlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis 'phags/ /chos kyi byin gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dong / /lha rnams
byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro/ skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor bar byed/ /mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la
bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston/ /chags pa med par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed/ /stong pa stan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa skye zhing yang
dag bskul ba byed/ /bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par
bzhud/ /gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god kyang / /rnam pa kun du
sems can mi gnas chos la ma yin spyod la ma yin pa'i/ /de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan te/ /de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu
'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse/ /zhing rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te/ /lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la'ang ngal dub gang
yang med/ /mkhas pas khyer nas ji lta'i gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa med/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag/ kun kyang ba
sbu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab ston kyang / /'phel
zhing 'grib med 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur med bya ba de yang ston/ /khor yug khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing / /zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma
snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog mi byed/ /zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed de/ /de 'dra'i rjes su dang ba zad par gyur kyang
'jug pa de dag mi zad do/ /'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed dang / /gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang me yi 'od dang gang na gang rnams lha dbang 'od/ /
mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed/ /'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston/ /'gro ba ma
lus sgra yi rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ /sku mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod/ /srog chags bye ba
rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thob dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ /rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur/ /gang yang ji snyed
'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston/ /gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston/ /khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang
gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston pa byed/ /'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig la rab tu 'god/ /'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji
snyed pa/ /de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang bsgyur rnam par 'phrul pa ston/ /sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems/ /de
snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med/ /lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing / /brgya byin tshangs
pa'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang mi yi rnams/ /gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub
pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams/ /thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang
rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston/ /'du shes dra ba rnams bsgoms blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnams la dbang bsgyur ba/ /bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang kun mchog byang
chub spyod pa sten/ /de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston/ /de dag gang la 'jig rten sa min pa dang yul min de dag
bya ba ston/ /ston kyang bya ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed/ /de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ci bzhin yang dag 'jug /lus
ni nam mkha' lta bu dag dang yid la chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso/ /tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs rgyan/ /chos kyi go 'phang
skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas/ /pha rol
phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog /ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin/ /spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo
bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o/ /thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los bsgyur/ /stong pa khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog
yin byams dang snying rje'i go cha'o/ /shes rab ral gri yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gdugs te/
ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms/ /gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lu ma shes rab
shing | |me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rnam par brgyan/ /stong pa rnam thar brgyan pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang po btsun mo yin/ /thar pa bdud rtsi
bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyis rtse/ /de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ongs khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang / /gang gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba
yongs su mi skyo bar/ /ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god/ /kha na ma tho kun med ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas
byed| |zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur blags re re nas kyang 'grang zhing brtsi bar nus 'gyur la/ /bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de/ /skad
cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nus so/ /gang zhig yon
tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang / /gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro ba thar byas bde la dgod par 'dod pa dang / /gang zhig bde bar
gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag /des ni rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i sems su gyis te yon tan bslab par byos/ /
shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //bam po brgyad cu drug
pa| bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal/ skyabs med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba'i nang / pho brang brtsegs pa bkod pa rgya chen po can na/ byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes
dang | chags med dam pa'i ye shes dang / me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang / nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang / zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / dri med dam pa'i ye shes dang /
rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdul med dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i
rgyal mtshan dang / ri rab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags med rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dri med rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal
mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul med rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gzi brjid
dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang / dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / bsod nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang / ye
shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang / kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi
brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / pad+mo'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang /
chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gtsug gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo'i dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i mig
dang / rnam par dag pa'i mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / chags pa med pa'i mig dang / kun nas blta ba'i mig dang / shin tu rnam par blta ba'i mig dang / ut+pa la'i mig
dang | rdo rje'i mig dang / rin po che'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gros
cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i cod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par byung
ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil gyis non pa med pa'i cod pan
dang | de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang / byang chub
sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub dam
pa'i gtsug phud dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin chen 'brug sgra'i gtsug phud dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad tha mi dad par rnam par dmigs pa'i rin chen rgyal pos brgyan pa'i gtsug
phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang ba'i rgyal mtshan rin po che'i rgyal po dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi ming thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya
chen po'i 'od dang / gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / rin po che'i 'od dang / rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / chos kyi 'od dang / zhi ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od
dang | rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / mngon
par shes pa'i dpal dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / me tog dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / byang chub kyi dpal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang
ba'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / sa sgra'i dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / ri dbang rgyal po 'thab
pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul
ba'i dbyangs dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya bas dbugs 'byin
pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'phags pa dang / khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang / ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang / bsod nams
ri bos 'phags pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang / grags pas 'phags pa dang / kun du snang bas 'phags pa dang / byams pa chen pos 'phags pa dang / ye
shes rgya mtshos 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang / mchog gi
dpal dang / kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang /
dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang
po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / zhi pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo ba'i dbang
po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / chags pa

med pa'i sgra dang / sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang / sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos snang ba'i sgra dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can kun gyi dge
ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrogs pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su bskul ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bcom zhing med par byed pa'i sgra dang / byang
chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo dang / ye shes ri bo'i blo dang / nam mkha'i blo dang / dri ma med pa'i blo dang / chags pa med pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang / dus
gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang / kun du snang ba'i blo dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i blo dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga
stong tsam ste/ kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'geng pa chags pa med pa'i spyod yul
can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa/ rnam
par dmigs par bya ba la bsgribs pa med pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/ nye bar 'dong pa rgyun mi
gcod pas tshad med par phyin pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ tha dad pa yang
dag par shes pa rnam par dag pas/ bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa mi zad pa/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas/ nam
mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa/ sems can gyi khams sems can med pa dang / srog med pa yongs su shes pas rab
rib med pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas par 'gengs pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /nyan thos rdzu 'phrul
chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la
zhugs pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / bcings
pa rnam par bzlog pa/ chags pa med pa'i gnas la brten pa nam mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas la the tshom dang / nem nur dang yid gnyis yongs su
chad pa| sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don
du zhugs pa/ gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i
ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba
mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul
chen po dang ldan pa de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod
yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs
dang | de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
ba dang | dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang / dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang bar rab tu thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam
pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam pa thag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing / yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa'am/
khong du chud pa'am/ yid ches pa'am/ yongs su shes pa'am/ rnam par rtogs pa'am/ gzung ba'am/ rnam par dpyad pa'am/ rnam par bsgom pa'am/ rnam par dbye
ba'am| rnam par grol ba'am/ rab tu brjod pa'am/ sems can pha rol gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar ni mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig dang brda sna tshogs su gyur pa/ dbang
bsgyur ba'i sa gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can/ sems dang bsam pa'i yul gzhan
dang gzhan can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ chos bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la/ sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs
pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
mngon par bsgrubs pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bkod pa yongs su dag par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par
bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub
pa dang | rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta'ang yang
dag par bstan grang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par 'phrul ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor
pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba lta'ang
yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par
bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs
pa sems can thams cad kyi yon bzhes pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang / yon ston pa'i cho
'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang
dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
thams cad la yongs su bstan pa dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge
'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi
sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par
snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i rang bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba/ thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam
par bzhag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus med par yangs shing / rdo rje thub pa med pa'i
rgyan mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu brgyan pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun du bkram pa/ rin po che du ma'i me tog sil mas
chal par gang ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes par bkram pa dang / bai DUR+Ya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye
ba dang / rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgo gang dang / rta babs
dang | pu shu dang / skar khung byas shing / khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan
dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba
dang | sgo dang / rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang / phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas them skabs kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing / shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes
par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang / chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi

zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang / chu zheng kun du rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa'i
gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i rwa bas kun nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas
mdzes pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad med pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba/ rin
po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'bab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyangs su sgrog pas rab tu brgyan pa dag kyang kun
nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i me tog puN+Da ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam yo rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing / shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par
bkod pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i
dra ba kun du snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa/ spos
thams cad kyi ngad kun nas 'byung ba/ bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan
dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che sna tshogs
kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i
rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang
ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings
thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal med khang gi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sprin
byis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba brjod du med
pa'i sprin las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang / nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo brjod du med pa'i sprin
gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du med pa'i steng lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa
la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis
kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing
brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin
gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas
par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams
cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings
thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon
gyi mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig
gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i
sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
ba spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar dze ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams
cad kyang yongs su dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu spud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / dze ta'i tshal du yang dag par
gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi sprin
gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / zhing
thams cad kyi bkod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad
kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes
pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / phreng ba dang / lda ldi dang / se mo do'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /
spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i sprin dang / na bun gyi char thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che
thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhib bu'i char rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
gyi sprin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kun du rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor
can| chu ba mthon po dang ldan pa'i ze ba la rol mo bkod pa/ kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang /
rin po che seng ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i phreng ba dang / se mo dos brgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal
po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin

gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyi char mngon
par gtor ba dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon
par gtor ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon
par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyi rlabs pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin
gyi rgyan yid du 'ong bas nam mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong
ste| 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogs su brten te khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan kun dang ldan zhing / nor bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas
khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis
kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi
zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i
rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lda ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang //
dra ba chen pos kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis
brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor thams cad phreng ba dang / lda ldi dang / se mo do'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil
'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi phreng bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra
bas kun nas 'brel bas byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lda ldis kun nas yongs su blangs shing gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi phreng ba dang / lda ldi mang po'i dra ba kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zhing thams cad nor bu rin po che
dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang
ba'i lda ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba dang lda ldi'i dra
bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas
pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs su brten te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che
phyogs kun tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus
su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha
rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi
zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs su
ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i
