mtsho rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du tha mi dad pa'i lus snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyis rjes su 'jug pa snying rje'i snying po can dang /
byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin shin tu zhi la rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i
dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmigs su med pas kun tu 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing
thams cad yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil
'khor chags pa med pas rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon
par bsgrub pas phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i
zhing rgya mtsho da ltar byung ba thams cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad
dang rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur
'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying bo'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la chos kyi dbyings kyi
tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khom par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhing 'byams klas pa bsgrub pa yongs su ston
pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u tshugs gzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi
zhing thams cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha mi dad par byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon sum du yang dag par
gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
dus gsum sems kyi skad cig la tha mi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin
dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon
pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
kha dog thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro ba shin tu mdzes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin klong mi g.yo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig gi lam la nges pa'i ngag gi tshig
tu 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho
de dag la rab tu 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la mthar thug pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud pas tha mi dad pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra bas stobs bcu khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa thams
cad du mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun du shugs kyis mngon du 'char ba'i sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan
dang | byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du nam mkha'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la 'gro ba snyed
kyi sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba dang / byang
chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ltar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan
rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sgron ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil
'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig
tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos
thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongs su bstan pas/ kun tu rnam par
dmigs pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu
sgrog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i sa mtshams 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma
lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad+mo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs gcig tu phyogs bcu rgya mtsho yongs su sdud pa'i klong dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad kyi sgor
'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu
'gyed pas rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon par shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon
par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyan gcig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyi rab tu snang ba dang /
byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig
gcig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig gis/ chos thams
cad tshul gcig par rnam par dgod pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi brjid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang
chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam dang / spyod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad tha mi dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad+mo'i byin rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus sems can
thams cad la mngon du byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su
'byed pa'i tshul mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod tha mi dad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa
dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / de dag la sogs pa
byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa
rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go /sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug
pa'i tshul gyis sngon skal pa mnyam par spyad pa yang rjes su dran no/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dze ta'i tshal du phyin cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod pa/ seng ge'i khri
rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang mnyam par yangs pa la 'khod pa/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa
chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pa'i sa rjes su thob pa/ ye shes kyi kun tu rnam par spyod pa/ shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su
byung ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad
dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa/ chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs
pa| 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/ gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba/
chos kyi gnas thams cad la bstan pa med par chos thams cad bla gab med pa'i gzhal med khang du byin pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa/ sems
can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i
shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ ting nge 'dzin gangs chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa/ chos kyi tshul sgyu
ma'i rnam pa lta bu rab tu rtogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/
sgra skad dang / dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa/ chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i
smon lam shin tu bsags pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa/ gzugs kyi rgyud
thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis dogs pa med pa kun nas rab tu gnon pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan
pa| chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par
mkhas pa/ spobs pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi sprin zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/ gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga'
bas mos pa/ chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i mig gis blta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa/ shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis
bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/ ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa/ dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ chos thams cad
la dbang po dang / ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa/ dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba la dpa' ba/ ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil
'khor gyi gzi brjid can/ 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa med pa/ zad pa dang
mi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi mig mngon sum
can byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa/ mi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam
par lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas med pa thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa/ chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba/ ye shes kyi dkyil
'khor mun pa med pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa/ thos pa dang / mthong ba
dang | smon lam don yod pa'i zla ba/ bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcod pa la shin
tu dpa' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang / dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas mi ngoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan
gyi dbang bsgyur ba dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/ zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba med
pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad
du lus rab tu snang ba/ ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba/ 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam
pa dang dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul du khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa/ phra ba
dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi sa zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/ don zab mo'i tshig dang / yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/ tshig dang /
yi ge dang / don mi zad pa rab tu brjod pa/ mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa/ gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa/ bskal pa
mtha' yas par yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du med par gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/
sems kyi skad cig gcig gis dus gsum shes pa/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pa/ chos kyi gzungs kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas
pa dran zhing spobs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu
thob pa/ gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa/ chos
thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba/ dmigs pa thams cad la rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos kyi
dbyings phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings las yang dag par gzhol ba shin tu phra ba ste/
yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba rang bzhin kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa/ phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon
tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/ bsngags pa/ bkur
ba| tshig dang / yi ge mi zad pas yon tan dang legs pa brjod du yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du 'dus te 'khod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la
'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa de dag gi lus thams cad dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de
dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stan de dag dang / dze ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang / dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba
bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob pas/ dga' ba'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /
'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par
gyur to/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang / legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin gyi nga ro rjes su
bsgrags pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /dmigs pa thams cad las 'gro ba thams cad kyi rol mo'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ sems can thams cad kyi las dang
rnam par smin pa/ rol mo'i sgra snyan par blang bas rjes su sgrog cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon
lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra
dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam
par brgyan pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ zhing thams cad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas skye ba gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab
par gyur to/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par
byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongs su ston cing / phyogs bcu sangs rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /dmigs pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon
nas| spos sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs shing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs
kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur
to| |de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyi rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i
sprin| sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul
pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed cing / phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dze ta'i tshal du sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs/ /mtha' yas rgya chen yongs
su byung la ltos/ /dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams/ /mngon par 'thon cing phyogs rnams kun tu khyab/ /bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan/ /kha dog mtha'
yas rgya chen rnam dag pa/ /stan dang dmigs pa yongs su bcas pa la/ /de dag thams cad gzugs brnyan byung ba snang / /rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin chen 'od
'phro'i sprin/ /bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las/ /sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing / /zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par 'phro/ /tshangs pa'i dbang
po'i gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang / /spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzugs/ /zhing gi me tog kun las mngon 'thon te/ /bsam gtan yan lag brjod cing kun tu 'dong / /
kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras/ /mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus/ /grangs med bsam yas bde gshegs pa spu las/ /sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa med
par 'byung / /bde gshegs sras po dus gsum byung ba rnams/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i legs pa brjod pa dag /rgya mtsho che mnyam rgyan sprin de dag kun/ /dze ta'i tshal na gnas
shing rab tu brjod/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi las/ /rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus par/ /dze ta'i tshal gyi shing gi gzugs rnams kyi/ /gseb nas byung
bar gyur pa kun tu grags/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam 'phrul pa/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed de dag kyang / /so so
dmigs kyi dmigs par gyur pa snang / /sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin/ /spu rtse re rer sna tshogs rnams phye ba'i/ /sangs rgyas gnas rnams skad cig re rer snang / /
de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs/ /'gro dang mnyam par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing / /sems can thabs kyis yongs su smin par byed/ /de dag 'od las spos kyi
'od 'phro dang / /me tog phal chen rgya mtsho sprin kyang 'byung / /mkha' ltar tshad med rin chen gzhal med khang / /ma lus rgyan rab kun gyis rnam mdzes pa/ /de dag thams cad phyogs
rnams kun khyab byed/ /zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin no/ /dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam tshul du/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho
rnam par dag byas pa'i/ /rgyan rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad med pa/ /phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam sbyangs pa/ /de dag kun
kyang dze ta'i nags tshal gyi/ /bar snang mkha' la gzugs brnyan tshul du snang / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag
las| |byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / snying rje chen po'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhugs par gyur nas/ de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams
cad la phan pa dang / yongs su bsdu ba'i don du zhugs par gyur te/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi
zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon par gyur te/ 'od zer de dag gi sgo re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'phrul pa'i sprin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po
thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon par blta ba'i lus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'phrod pa'i las dang ldan pa
mngon par 'thon te/ mngon par 'thon nas kyang / phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas/ sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul zhing yongs su
smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar byed do/ /lha'i gnas nas shi 'phos pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / rmi lam yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
kyis sems can yongs su bskul ba byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su bskyod pa'i sgo dang / sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan la nan tan du bya ba dang rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag
gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i
sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil
'khor snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge re re'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su
bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongs su dri ba'i sgo dang / dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro
ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba'i rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang phas kyi rgol bas mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / bzo thams cad shes shing
mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing / mkhas pa dang ldan
pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing / mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo
dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mongs pa dang bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shes shing / mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i
ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de dag la sogs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i thabs dang / bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/ la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la
ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni dri za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas su phyin par
snang ngo / /la la ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni mi'am ci'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni lto phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /
la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni mi'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni yi dwags kyi gnas thams
cad du phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni yi dwags kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang ste/ mthong
bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang / thos pas 'dul ba dang / rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'dul ba dang / ming gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang / 'od
kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye bas 'dul ba dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha mi dad pa dang / smon lam tha mi dad pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa dang / sems can yongs su bsdu ba tha mi dad pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan pa sna tshogs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad rgyas par
'gengs pa byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo ste/ la la ni rang gi gnas dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / stan dang / 'khor du bcas pas phyogs
bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo'o/ /la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang / la la ni
sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'gro bar snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas mi g.yo'o/ /la la ni dge sbyong
gi gzugs/ la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ la la ni brtul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang / cho ga dang / chu zheng gi gzugs/ la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ la la ni tshong
pa'i gzugs/ la la ni snyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/ la la ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs/ la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/ la la ni bzo thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su grong
dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes su 'brang zhing / ming dang / gzugs
dang / lus mngon par bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang / lus kyi kha dog dang / dbyibs tshul dang 'dra ba dang / dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / spyod lam rnam
pa tha dad pa dang / gnas rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad mig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang / bzo'i 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod
pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang / bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan
pa dang / phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing / sems can
yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag tu phyin par snang ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las/ bskal pa mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang /
'jig rten thams cad kyi nyams blta ba la brtson zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang / sngon gyi smon
lam gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang gis 'gro ba'i rigs su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang / chos mnyan pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag dang / snying rje chen po la brtson pa'i lu ma dang /

mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang / chu klung gi lha dag dang / shes rab kyi 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dag dang / rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag
dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i nam mkha'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba
thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gangs chen mtsho'i lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bsags pa la brtson zhing / dge ba'i
rtsa ba'i sgo mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang / byin gyi
rlabs la smon cing brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su bskyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
chos kyi grong khyer du smon cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad
kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang po dag dang / yi dwags kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag
dang / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku dang / stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing / lus rab
tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing ngor lta ba'i lha'i dbang po dag dang / rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i
tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang / lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de mchod cing / de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs
pa dang ldan par rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma zhig tu byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod de/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung nas/ lho phyogs logs su yul rgyu zhing song ngo // //bam po brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas dze ta'i tshal nas byung ste/ lho phyogs logs
su 'gro ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing 'gro'o snyam nas/ de dge slong drug
cu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas
bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste/ 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der/ dge slong lhan cig tu spyod pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa gsar du zhugs pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang / legs
par byin pa chen po dang / bsod nams kyi 'od dang / bu chen po dang / kun khyab sbyin pa dang / rnam dag spyod pa dang / lha'i dpal dang / dbang po'i blo gros dang / tshangs pa'i
dam pa dang / dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros dang / de dag la sogs pa'i dge slong drug cu tsam kun kyang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/ mos pa zab mor gyur
pa| dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa/ sems rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par blta ba la mthu yod pa/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin nges par rtogs
pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhan la phan par gyur pa'i blo can de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pas 'dul ba sha
stag dang 'grogs shing mdun du byas te/ sngon du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ de ltar lam du zhugs te
'dong ba'i tshe/ dge slong de dag kun la bltas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo la smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i blo/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam
par brgyan cing yongs su dag pa/ lha dang mir bcas par bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag cing sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongs su skyed pa
dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan sems can dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung ba dang / lam
gyi rgyan mgron lam mig mangs ris su gnas pa dang / lam rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la mngon par lta bar gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun sum
tshogs pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nas gter chen po mngon par 'thon pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pas shing gi gseb thams cad nas
rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyogs
bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po bkye ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing spyi bor 'char ba la ltos shig ces/
de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam du zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag dge slong de dag la yongs su bstan to/ /
brjod do/ /bshad do/ /smos so/ /bkrol lo/ /rab tu brjod do/ /rnam par phye'o/ /gsal bar byas so/ /de ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
yon tan ji tsam du brjod pa de tsam du dge slong de dag gi sems rnam par dag par gyur to/ /rab tu dang bar gyur to/ /dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /mos pa skyes par
gyur to/ /de dag gi sems kyi rgyud las su rung bar gyur to/ /dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur to/ /yid bde ba rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /yid mi bde ba rab tu byang bar gyur
to| |sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur to/ /sgrib pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems
rab tu gzhol bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su dag par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skyes par gyur to/ /snying rje chen po 'byung bar gyur
to| |pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to/ /snying rje chen po yongs su skyes par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar de dag
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzer to/ /mkhan po/ bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes nas/ de nas
tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag dang 'grogs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la
blta bar 'dod pa dag go /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas pa glang po'i lta stangs kyi sa gzi
dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang / de'i rjes la dge slong de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces
smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang / khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang / mkhan pos thugs su chud pa
dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyod ci 'dra bar de 'dra bar gyur te/ rnam pa
'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog cig /rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin thob par
shog cig ces/ dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong dag /yongs su mi skyo ba'i
sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta smos kyang ci smos kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la yongs su mi skyo
ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing / yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs su mi skyo
ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad
yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par dgang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas/ sems can gcig yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul du sems can thams cad yongs su smin
par bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o/ /dge slong dag /yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di
dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog
par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dag par 'grub par
'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong de dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad
rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus
par mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs
su mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to/ /sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas
dang longs spyod de dag kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho yang thos par gyur to/ /chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang / yi ge dang / nges
pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming dang / brdas yongs su shes par gyur to/ /sems can de dag gi sems dang / dbang po dang / bsam pa la yang rnam par lta bar gyur to/ /sngon gyi mtha'
dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu yang rjes su dran par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa la yang rab tu zhugs
par gyur to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur
to| |rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa
bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu
yang yongs su non par gyur to/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang rnam par dag par gyur te/ snang ba chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen
po'i dkyil 'khor gyis snang bar gyur pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin tu
phra ba thob ste/ byang chub tu sems skyes pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul
nas rab tu bkod do/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa de dag smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par bsgrub par gyur to/ /
de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /lus rnam par dag pas lus yang ba rab tu thob
par gyur to/ /de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang / lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas mi nyams shing / rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par
shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /mngon par shes pa de dag thob pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs
su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong
de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas/ mthar gyis yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs logs skyid pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der

logs su song ste phyin nas/ grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs logs na nags tshal chen po sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs
pa'i mchod rten/ sems can smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ zhing mtha' yas par ming gi sgra rjes su grags pa/ sngon chad bcom ldan
'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ yongs su btang bar dga' ba du ma yongs su btang ste/ sa'i phyogs de na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod pa la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa der/ 'khor dang
bcas te phyin nas/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu 'byung ba bstan to/ /
de bstan pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po nas klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nye bar lhags te/ de dag gis chos kyi tshul de thos nas/ klu'i rgyud la rnam par smod
cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par gyur nas klu'i rgyud rnam par bzlog ste/ lha dang mir skya ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /chos de bstan pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam
par dul bar gyur to/ /de nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal du phyin te/ sA la sna tshogs kyi
rgyan gyi gzhi 'di nyid na rnam par spyod do zhes thos nas/ dge bsnyen tshong dpon shes rab chen po la sogs pa dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang
po dag so so nas 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang bcas te/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba dar dong ngo / /de la dge bsnyen
shes rab chen po ni/ dge bsnyen bzang pos byin dang / lhas byin dang / bsod nams 'od dang / grags pa'i lha dang / grags pas byin dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / zla ba dga'
bo dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / sgra gcan bzang po dang / dge bsnyen bzang po'i dpal dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas ba skor cing mdun du byas
te| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan
gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la dge bsnyen ma shes rab chen mo ni/ dge bsnyen ma 'od bzang mo dang / lus bzang mo dang / dge ba yod pa dang / dge ba'i
dpal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / dpal bzang mo dang / dge bsnyen ma mig bzang mo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan
gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ni tshong dpon gyi bu brtul zhugs bzang po dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / ngang tshul
bzang po dang / rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang / bsam pa bzang po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo bzang po dang / mig bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'od
bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la khyim
bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang mo ni/ bu mo bzang mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / dpal bzang mo dang / tshangs pas byin pa dang / dpal
gyi 'od dang / bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag 'dus te 'khod par shes nas/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'i byin gyis
zil gyis gnan te/ byams pa chen po'i byin gyis sim par byas nas/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyis chos bstan pa mngon par bsgrubs te/ ye shes kyi byin gyis sems dang bsam pa
rnam par phye nas tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen pos chos bstan par dga' ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la bltas so/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang zhes bya ba/ ci'i phyir nor
bzang zhes bya zhe na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang zhes bya ba/ thog ma ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po 'thon par
gyur to/ /rin po che'i sdong po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / asma gar b+ha dang / mu sa ra gal
pa dang / rin po che de bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang gter de dag nas skyes te/ sa'i gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'thon par gyur to/ /de yan lag dang nying lag thams cad
yongs su rdzogs te/ zla ba bcu lon nas btsas pa dang / de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang / rngams su khru bdun tsam du sa'i steng nas mngon par 'phags te snang bar
byung nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyur to/ /khyim der rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod lnga brgya yang byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar mar gyi snod dang / til mar gyi snod dang / sbrang rtsi'i snod
dang | mar gsar gyi snod dang / gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dag ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang /
spos kyi snod gos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / man shel gyi snod kha zas dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs ro mchog tu zhim pas yongs su gang ba
dang | nor bu'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / gser gyi snod dngul sil mas yongs su gang ba dang / dngul gyi snod gser phyes yongs su gang ba dang / phra men
gyi snod nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Yas yongs su gang ba dang / shel gyi snod mu sa ra gal pas yongs su gang ba dang / mu sar gal pa'i snod rin po che shel gyis yongs su gang ba dang /
asma gar b+ha'i snod mu tig dmar pos yongs su gang ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i snod asma gar b+has yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snod nor bu rin po
che chu 'dang gis yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi snod nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su gang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i snod lnga
brgya 'thon par gyur to/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang de btsas ma thag tu khyim dang / bang ba dang / mdzod thams cad du nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / rin
po che sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /de la bram ze'i bltas pa dang / pha dang / ma dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 'di btsas ma thag tu nor mang po phun sum tshogs
pa byung bar gyur pas na/ nor bzang / nor bzang zhes de ltar ming du btags te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzang de ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /
mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam pa can no/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
lam yongs su sbyang ba la rab tu brtson pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /bsam pa'i nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'o//
byang chub kyi sems chags pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la bltas te/ dga' ba'i gtam byas nas/ de
la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhing thob par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad
gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad shes par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i rgyan las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan
dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi gsung rnam par phye ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa
nyid las kyang brtsams te/ chos kyang bstan par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos dang mthun
ba'i gtam gyis bstan te/ yang dag par bskul nas spro ba bskyed de dga' bar byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/ sngon gyi
dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dran par byas nas/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pas byin gyis brlabs te/ bde bar
byas nas de nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las/ rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / che ba nyid thos nas bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod do/ /blo gros chen po
mtha' yas spyod yul can/ /khyod kyi mthus ni sems can sman slad du/ /bdag kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur/ /de la nges pa gang mchis bdag la gson/ /dga' ba'i chus bkang
'obs kyis kun nas bskor/ /nga rgyal dregs pa'i ra ba mtho bar brtsegs/ /sems can lam rgyud sgo rnams btsud cing gdangs/ /de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum ming ldan che/ /de ni gti
mug ma rig gzings pas khebs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu gdungs/ /rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang du gyur/ /de la byis pa ma rig rten kyang 'cha'/ /sred pa'i sgrog
dang zhags pas shin tu glags/ /g.yo dang sgyu yi skyon gyis mtho brtsams shing / /the tshom yid gnyis dag gis mig mdongs pa/ /log pa phyin phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs/ /phrag
dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcings/ /yi dwags byol song sems dmyal mi khom rgyu/ /rga shi na dang skye bas rab tu mnar/ /mgo rmongs lam rgyun 'bar lo kun tu 'khor/ /
de la khyod ni thugs rje rnam dag pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od zer snang ba mdzad/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho skam par shar te 'phags/ /nyi ma 'dra bas bdag la snang ba mdzod/ /byams pa
bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs shing nya/ /bsod nams zla 'od bde ba'i zer 'gyed pa/ /sems can kun gyi gnas su shar gyur gyi/ /zla ba nya ba lta bus bdag snang mdzod/ /dkar
mthus thams cad yongs bsags bskor mnga' zhing / /chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa mi mnga' ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dren pas/ /rgyal
por gyur pas bdag la bstan du gsol/ /byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthu mnga' ste/ /bsod nams ye shes shin tu yangs bsags shing / /sems can kun la phan pa'i don
bzhugs pa'i/ /ded dpon chen pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol/ /bzod pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go mnabs te/ /ye shes spyan mnga' thugs rje'i phyag ring bas/ /bdud kyi dmag
dpung tshogs rnams mngon 'gyur bar/ /dpa' ba chen pos bdag gi sel yang mdzod/ /chos kyi ri rab spo la brtan bzhugs shing / /ting 'dzin mchog gi lha mos kun nas bskor//
nyon mongs sgra gcan lha min 'dul mdzad pa/ /brgya byin gyur pas bdag kyang gzigs su gsol/ /byis pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khang pa na/ /nyon mongs las rnams rnam
par bsal ba mkhyen/ /rgyu yi sa dang lam rgyud 'khor rmongs par/ /me mar 'dra bas bdag kyang shul bstan gsol/ /ngan 'gro'i lam rnams rnam par zlog mdzad cing / /bde
bar 'gro ba'i lam rnams rnam sbyong ba/ /'jig rten kun gyi lam gyi rgyud las 'das/ /bdag la'ang thar pa'i sgo ni bstan du gsol/ /rtag dang bdag dang bde bar 'du shes
ldan| |log 'dzin sgo re'i skyabs kyis bcad gyur gyi/ /bden pa'i ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' bas/ /thar sgo bdag la'ang myur du dbye bar gsol/ /yang dag log pa'i lam la
mkhas gyur cing / /lam gyi rgyus dang tshul la bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lam rnams kun gyis 'dul ba thugs chud pa/ /bdag la byang chub shul ni bstan du gsol/ /yang dag lta ba'i
sa yi thang la bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab kyis bskrun/ /sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa/ /byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsol/ /rgyal ba gang
'das ma byon gang rnams dang / /da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba snang mdzad pa/ /sems can gtso bo legs par gshegs pa'i phyogs/ /de yang lam ston mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol
las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi bsnyengs pa/ /chos theg shing rta'i 'khrul 'khor mkhyen gyur cing / /ye shes theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa/ /byang chub theg pa bdag la bshad
du gsol/ /mos shing smon pa'i 'khor lo'i mu khyud can/ /bzod pa rdo rje snying rje srog shing brten/ /dad pa'i gnya' shing rin chen legs spras pa'i/ /byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon
du gsol/ /gzungs rnams kun gyis rnam dag dkyil 'khor can/ /byams pa brtsegs pa'i dga' bas rab brgyan pa/ /tha dad yang dag shes pa'i dril phreng can/ /theg mchog
bzang pos bdag la bstan du gsol/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par brgyan/ /ting 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun nas rgyu/ /chos kyi
rnga yi dbyangs chen rab bsgrags pa/ /theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstab tu gsol/ /bsdu ba bzhi yi mi zad mdzod ldan pa/ /ye shes rin chen yon tan phreng gis brgyan/ /khrel
yod dul ba'i 'phreng bas mchog bsdams pa'i/ /theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan du gsol/ /sbyin pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can/ /tshul khrims tsan dan snying rje'i
byug ldan zhing / /bzod pa'i gzer gyis mtshams rnams dam sbyar ba'i/ /theg pa'i mchog la myur du bdag gzhag gsol/ /sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa/ /
bsam gtan ting 'dzin kha khyer mthor sgron cing / /shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor mthun 'gro rgyu ba'i/ /chos kyi theg pa mchog la bdag gzhag gsol/ /smon lam 'khor
los lam gyi 'khor sbyong ba/ /chos kyi gzugs dam mthu brtan che ldan zhing / /ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs byas pa'i/ /chos kyi theg pa de la bdag bskyon
gsol/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing / /sems can lta bas rgyu la thogs med pa/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas gnon gyur pa'i/ /ye shes theg pas bdag la
bsdud du gsol/ /de ni brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa/ /ye shes sgyu mas legs sbyangs legs byas shing / /sgrib dang chags pa thams cad gcod pa yi/ /bzang po'i theg la bdag
kyang bskyon par gsol/ /'gro mnyam dri med shin tu yangs gyur pa/ /sems can thams cad skyob pas bde sgrub cing / /chos dbyings shin tu rgya chen rnam snang ba'i/ /byang chub theg
la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /sdug bsngal phung po rab byung gcod byed pa/ /nyon mongs las kyi rdul mang sbyong sel cing / /bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba kun 'joms pa'i/ /chos kyi theg
la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /phyogs rnams kun tu ye shes rab snang ba/ /chos dbyings nam mkha' rnam par klubs byed cing / /sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed pa'i/ /
chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /rnam dag mkha' ltar tshad med mi zad pa/ /sred dang ma rig lta ba'i skyon med cing / /sems can kun la phan par rab gnas pa'i/ /chos
kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /rlung chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan pas/ /smon lam mthu yis 'jig rten kun 'dzin cing / /zhi ba'i gnas rab kun sar skyel byed
pa'i| |chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /sa chen bzhi yi stobs kyi stobs ldan pa/ /snying rje'i mthu dang shugs kyis khur khyer zhing / /ye shes lo tog 'gro ba nyer 'tsho
ba'i| |theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /nyi ma lta bur 'gro ba nyer 'tsho zhing / /bsdu ba rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ /gzungs
kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od bzang ba'i/ /ye shes nyi ma bdag la bstan du gsol/ /bskal pa mang po du mar rab bslabs pa/ /rgyu yi tshul dang sa kun mkhas gyur pa/ /gang gis
'dus byas grong khyer gzhom 'gyur ba'i/ /shes brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la stsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas legs kun bslab pa phun sum gyis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa
gang zhig la/ /tshad med rgya mtsho'i blo mang bslab gyur pa/ /de legs ci 'dra 'phags pas bka' stsal gsol/ /gang na yang dag spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs shing / /ye shes rgyal
po'i cod pan legs brgyan te/ /chos kyi dbu thod dam pas dbu bcings pa'i/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang bdag kyang ston/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ glang po'i lta
stangs kyis bltas te/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri bar bsam pa
legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang / rim gror bya ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su grub par
'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te/ 'di ni mthun pa'i rgyu yin gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ de bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bas yongs su ma skyo bar gyis shig /nor bzang gis
smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa brtsam par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su
rdzogs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug
par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su
'brang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la lhag par dmigs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyas
par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba rgya cher bstan du gsol/ de nas
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams gangs chen mtsho/ /de ltar khyod ni nga yi drung du nyer phyin
te| |snying rje'i snying brtse rgya chen gyi/ /yid ldan byang chub dam pa tshol bar legs/ /'gro ba thams cad dgrol don du/ /spyod pa mtshungs med don du smon lam rab 'debs shing / /
'gro ba kun gyi skyabs 'gyur ba/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul 'di yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i nang na skyo med yid kyis spyod byed pa/ /
de dag kun tu bzang po yi/ /spyod pa thub med chags med 'thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams 'od can bsod nams dpal/ /de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la/ /'gro
la phan phyir smon byed pa/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho dge zhing dag pa'i mtshan/ /mtha' dang dbus med tshad med pa'i/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kun kyang mthong bar
'gyur/ /dran pa'i mthu dang stobs kyis kyang / /de dag chos kyi sprin kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de ltar khyod kyis phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu rgyal
ba mthong nas kyang / /byang chub spyod pa'i don gyi phyir/ /de dag kun la smon lam rgya mtsho dag byed 'gyur/ /'jig rten gtso la slob byed cing / /gang rnams sangs rgyas sa la gnas ni
bcas byas shing / /'di tshul rgya mtshor zhugs gyur pa/ /de dag kun kyang thams cad gzigs par 'gyur/ /khyod ni 'byams klas zhing kun du/ /bskal mang zhing rdul snyed du kun tu bzang
po yi| |spyod pa'i dam pa spyod byas shing / /byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhing rnams mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /ma lus kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad par gyis/ /kun
tu bzang po'i spyod mchog phyir/ /smon lam rgya chen yongs su rdzogs par byos/ /khyod kyi smon lam thos gyur nas/ /sems can khrag khrig dga' ba yongs su skyes gyur cing / /kun tu bzang
po'i ye shes kyis/ /byang chub mchog tu smon pa byed la ltos/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzang po la 'di
skad ces bsgo'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal bar sems dpa'
legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i sems can yang rab tu dkon te/ de bas kyang gang gis bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba de lta bu'i sems can ni ches dkon
no| |rigs kyi bu/ de bas na byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen las gdon mi za bar rtogs
pa thob par gyis shig /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba la yongs su skyo ba'i yid med par gyis shig /dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba la ngoms pa med par gyis
shig |dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin par gyis shig /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la khong khro ba med par gyis shig/
rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na mgul legs pa zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod pa de la/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal zhes bya
ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems
dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs
par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs
par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dris shig dang / dge ba'i bshes
gnyen de khyed la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ lan brgya
brgya stong du mar phyir bltas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba'i sems dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba mi bzod de/ gdong mchi mas gang bar du
zhing | 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang mthar gyis yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba der song ste/ phyin nas yul mi mo gya nom
mchog nas rnam par rgyus te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas byung zhing las rgya chen byin gyis brlabs pa'i longs spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongs su spyod cing / ri mgul legs pa gang na ba der phyin
nas/ mgul legs pa'i ri la 'dzegs te/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol zhing shar phyogs logs su byung ngo / /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang
dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su'ang byung ste/ bla 'og tu'ang lta zhing
dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol ba las/ des zhag bdun lon pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal ri rtse zhig gi sman ljongs na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ dge slong sprin gyi
dpal gang na ba der song ste/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug
nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa thugs su chud par mdzad du gsol/ /bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji
ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam pa dang / ji ltar
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spyod pa rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / ji
ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bgyi ba
dang | ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyod ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams
ngag dang / rjes su ston pa mdzad ces thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du
gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri ba legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal
ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par
dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa rnam par dag
pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgyud yongs su bstan
pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su bstan pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang / 'jigs pas mi gos pa'i rgyud yongs su btsal ba 'di ni dka'o/ /shin tu dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho
bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis/ mig gi blo gros dang / dad pa'i mig rnam par dag pas/ kun tu mngon par blta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba phyin phyogs med pa dang / yul kun
la thogs pa med cing bsgribs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / mig gi yul kun nas yongs su dag pa'i lus rnam par dag pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud 'byams
klas pa thams cad du mngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyis 'dud pa la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi stobs kyis/ phyogs kyi rgyud
thams cad kun nas mngon du gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas gnyis dang /
bcu dang / sangs rgyas brgya dang / sangs rgyas stong dang / sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba stong dang / sangs rgyas
bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs
pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong dang / stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin

gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong gi rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ shar phyogs logs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub
phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og
dang / bla'i phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs re rer rnam par bltas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / dbyibs sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / rnam
par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu dang / rnam par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba
dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba kha dog du ma can dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / pho brang dang rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba
dang | sku tshe'i tshad rnam par dag pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i
sgos rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro rnam par sgrog pa mang po mthong ngo / /de ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni sgo kun
nas dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thob par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
par dag pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / pho brang rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mngon par mthong bas/ sangs rgyas
rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas kun nas snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag
pas| sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bas/
sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo stobs kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgo'i sprin la blta bas/ sangs
rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo chos kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas mtsho tha mi dad pa la 'jug
pas| sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba
la rab tu phra bar dmigs shing 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa
mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa dang mi 'bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bskal par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus thams cad du de bzhin
gshegs pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus su sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas
mngon par 'phags shing / zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su mthong zhing rnam par rig pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhing du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa
dang / gang gis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rang gi sems dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus gsum
du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dmigs pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang dag par tshogs pa mthong zhing dmigs pas/ sangs
rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dmigs par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
'da' ba rnam par dmigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhi bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis nyin gcig tu gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'bral bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa re re skyil mo krung du bzhugs
pas kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu yangs pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob
pa dang / gang gis skra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa byung ba mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu phra bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa
dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam par dmigs pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo
rgyan du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes snang ba rab
tu thob pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bgos par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / rang gis sems dang bsam pa la bltas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad rab tu snang ba thob pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo sems kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi las rnam pa ji lta bur bsags pa'i
gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo las kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad+mo'i tshal gyis
rgyas par sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa/ phyogs kun tu mngon sum du dmigs pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul pas sgro btags
pa rab tu thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin dbyangs sgrog pas chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun nas snang ba/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su
dran pa'i sgo nam mkha' sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid
na| phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo zhes bya ba yod pa de na/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang / rigs kyi bu/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyod la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang / rgyu yongs su ston par 'gyur
ro| |tshogs kyis rgya chen po yang khong du chud par byed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs rgya chen po yang yongs su skyed par byed do/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang / rgyu
rgya chen po yang yongs su brjod par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang / snang bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu rgya chen po yang skyed par byed do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs
