ba'i shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang / snyan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten la don mthun par bsgrub pa ston par byed cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par
bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo / /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus dbyibs su 'khod pa/ pags pa dang / shun pa'i gos gyon pa/ ril ba thogs
pa| gzugs dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs sna tshogs can/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byung nas/ steng gi bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
rjod par byed cing / chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su bstan pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs
su brjod pa dang / dbang po dben pa la sems can dgod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang / ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig
rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang / mthar gyis bya ba'i las la
sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo / /rtsib logs gnyis nas klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa/
lus kyi dbyibs bsam gyi mi khyab pa du ma dang ldan pa byung ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang / spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi
khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang / phreng ba'i sprin
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rnam par klubs pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad
yongs su khebs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i

phyang phrul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i se mo do sna tshogs
dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i khri la skyil mo krung du 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis
mi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i bu mo mang po chos kyi glu snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi
khyab pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo ze ba mtho ba/ mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char rnam par 'thor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan
dang / rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i
lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i bu mo mang po'i
lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te/ gser gyi me tog snyim pas 'thor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin
cing char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan/ nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis rlob cing / spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / bdug
spos kyi na bun dang / sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas
pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas skad cig skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad
rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /mthongs ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston cing / chu 'dzin chen po yongs su bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod
pa dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su bskyod pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang / bdud
kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang / nga rgyal dang / rlom pa dang / dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba
dang / mtho 'tsham pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtor bar bya ba dang /
nyon mongs pa'i 'thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dang / sdig pa
las gyen du bskyod pa dang / 'khor pas 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du bskyod de/ gnas med pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / byang
chub kyi sems la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems
dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyis sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra
ba snyed byung nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa yongs su rjod
par byed cing / rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang
gi spyod pa can rnams la byams pa dang / gti mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rkyen las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pa dang / cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa can rnams la
ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang / yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang / zhi ba la gnas su sems pa
rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang sgo thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du
rjod par byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /phrag pa'i lhun gnyis las gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i dbang po'i dbyibs
sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / lus mi sdug pa dang / kha dog dang chu zheng sna tshogs can/ spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ bzhon pa sna tshogs la zhon pa/ 'khor sna tshogs
kyis yongs su bskor ba sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa/ dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs shing /
dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba
dang / lag na rdo rje'i las kyis yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba
dang / sems can log par lhung ba rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa
thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i don du brtson pa/ sems can gyi don bya bas 'jig rten yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa rnams bsod nams dang ye shes
kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor tshar gcod par byed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams
cad rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /mdun gyi lto nas mi'am ci'i dbang po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed/ mi'am ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang / dri za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dri za'i dbang
po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dag byung nas lha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i sgra snyan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi bstod pa rjod pa byed cing / byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang /
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu
dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang / sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par
bzlog par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su skyed pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /kha'i sgo
nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po/ rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing / stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas/ sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan rab
tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad spyin pa dang / dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / srog
gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / byams pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang rab tu dbral ba dang / rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan
pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su gtang ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / brdzun du smra
ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / bslu ba med pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan 'dum par
brtson pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / gnod pa'i chos
dang ldan pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / don zab mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba las yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngag gi nyes
pa thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi snying gi dri ma yongs su sel cing / 'dod pa chung
ba dang / chog shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa
la rab tu dgod pa dang / lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang / yid gnyis kyi ra ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang / the tshom gyi spo thams cad
rab tu gzhom pa dang / nem nur dang som nyi'i rab rib yongs su bsal ba dang / chos rnam par dbye ba 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang / rkyen las byung ba rab tu brjod pa dang /
rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi don gyi
tshul sna tshogs brjod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongs su snang bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang /
sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi rab rib sel ba dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi grang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sa'i rang
bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od kha dog dkar bo can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin gyi
zhing rnams su 'od dngul gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing
rnams su 'od shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / asma gar b+ha'i rang bzhin gyi
zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od asma gar b+ha'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed
pa dang / in+d+ra nI la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi
zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu
tig dmar po kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs
kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can gyi
don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing
grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas
blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags par byed cing / sems can tshad med pa gdul ba la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /dpral ba nas
tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas tshangs pa'i dbyangs su brjod de sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa
dang | byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba byed cing sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon
gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /mgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ kha dog dang dbyings sna tshogs kyis brgyan
pa'i lus yongs su ston cing / dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i lus rab tu bstan pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i
bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste/ gtong ba dang / len pa dang / dngos po yongs su gtong ba'i rnam pa'i sprin
mang po rab tu dgye ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi spyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten
du yongs su brjod pa dang / ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang / chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams
cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod
pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston pa byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor
ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon du phyogs par
bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par smad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling tog rnam par bsal ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar
byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu
thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmi lam lta bur sems can rnams la rab tu brjod
cing | rmi lam gyi tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir/ yul yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa la dbang bsgyur ba sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa byed pa
mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ 'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur mngon par ston
cing | khro ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / shar gnyer ba med pa dang / zhe sdang ba med pa dang / chud gson pa med pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems la sems can rab
tu dgod pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i srid rab tu 'gyed cing / bzod pa'i stobs la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chos la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed
pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su btsal bas mi skyo bar bya
bar yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba la sems can rab tu gzud pa/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog
pa'i brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab
tu 'gyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can rnams kyi le lo'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang /
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / las la dbang bsgyur ba la 'jig rten rab tu gzud pa dang / rgyun ma 'chad par brtson par byed
pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la
sems can thams cad rab tu dgod cing / sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang / rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang / rlom pa dang bag med pa thams cad las sems can
rnam par bzlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang / khengs pa 'gying ba dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag
rgya mtsho brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan
pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / sems can la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs
pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba
dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang /
yang dag par lta ba'i glog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i ri'i lhun rab tu gzhig pa dang / lta ba
thams cad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba dang / the tshom dang yid gnyis dang nem nur gyi rab rib rnam par bsal ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par
bsngags pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed byung nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu rjod par byed cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i
sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang /
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa tha mi dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan
pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi
dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing / sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad
nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug
par 'dril ba/ chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa/ mi shes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba 'jig rten du rab tu rjod pa byed cing smon lam
sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul bas/ sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu dbyung ba dang / ba spu bu ga thams

cad nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongs stobs yongs su bstan
pa dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdib kyang mi nyams pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / bskal pas 'tshig pa thams
cad kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyis
nam mkha'i dbyings su ston pa'i stobs yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings 'gengs pa rgyun mi gcod pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub
sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad
nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu 'gyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon
tan dang ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rab tu brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis
mngon par bstan pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brjod pa dang / sems can
thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sems can thams
cad bdag med pa'i rang bzhin la gzud pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par blta ba
mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
kyi sa rab tu dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par brjod pa
dang | sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rnam par dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad
kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yongs su ston pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas
par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra
ba snyed mtshan dam pa dang / dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba/
'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur spa zhing tshad med par 'bar ba dang / chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa 'gro ba thams cad la tha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa ste/ 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu
phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la gzhi kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang
bskur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes
bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char
mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam bdag pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char
mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yongs su sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par
dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang / thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu bsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis
dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu
mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i
chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon
par dbab pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha
rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de
bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi
nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dri za'i dbang po'i gnas
su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par bgro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi tshul rdo rje'i
dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i thabs kyi sprin
ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos
kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba skyed pa zhes bya
ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i gnas su dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya
ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang / 'phags
pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba med pa la
nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/ sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba zhes
bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can log par lhung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas dbugs dbyung ba'i
dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu
ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang / gzugs kyi glong dang rgyan grangs med pa can/ dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med pa
la sta gon du gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar ba spu'i sgo'i 'od
zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang / dkyil
'khor la la las ni/ dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / yid dam dang / tshul gyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong
ngo| |ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzod pa'i spyod pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems
dpa' rnams rkang lag dang / yan lag gi dam pa gcad kyang / nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / khu tshur dang dbyig pas bsnun te/ mtshon gyis lus la btab
kyang | nyams su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad gshegs sam snying dang mig phyung yang / nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong
ngo| |byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du byung ba/ rnam par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos
nyid yongs su btsal ba'i ched du lus dang sems la gnod pa thams cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir
nyams su bzod par byas pa dang / bag la zha bar byas pa dang / gtang snyoms su bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzugs
brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus
kyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye ba'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul
ba 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang / rgya mtsho yongs su skem pa dang / sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang / mu stegs can thams cad yongs su tshar gcad pa dang /
bdud thams cad spa bkong ba dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ngo / /pa spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang / lus nye bar len pa ji snyed pa dang / rigs su skye ba yongs su gzung
ba ji snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bstan pa yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang mthun pa'i gtsug lag khang dang / gnas
dang | gzhal med khang dang / yul dang / ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs su bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang / rgyal po'i thabs
ji snyed pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / yi dam dang / tshul dang / spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor
bzang gis mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing / chos thams cad
yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su bzung ba mthong ste/ lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig gi don du yang bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams
cad las yongs su btsal ba dang / rim gro dang / bkur sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad las yongs su btsal ba
dang | dad pa dang / sri zhus lus rab tu btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongs su btsal ba dang / chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/ 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyis yongs su btsal ba de dag thams
cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ ba spu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil
'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byams klas pa sems
can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor ba mthong ngo / /sems can re re la yang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo sngon gyi lus nye bar blangs pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i spyod
pa la brtson pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su sdud pa yang ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo / /ba
spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa thams cad du smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / sems
can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad
pa ji snyed pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du 'khor ba'i skyon thams
cad las 'khor ba'i skyon so so re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrubs pa mdzad pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra
ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i
sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba thams cad dang ldan pa mi shes pa'i
gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge slong rgya
mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par
bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang /
mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo rgyud kun la mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de
la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnod pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi stobs de yongs su bskyed
pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs de brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs de shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal
mtshan gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig kyang lon no/ /nyin zhag gnyis dang / bdun yang lon no/ /zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig dang / zla ba gnyis dang / zla ba drug gi bar dang / nyin zhag
kyang drug tu dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du lon te/ de ltar zla ba drug dang / nyin zhag drug 'das nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las
langs so/ /de nas nor bzang gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar zab la/ de ltar rgya che zhing / de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar mi 'phrog pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa
dang | de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa rab tu sgrub par
gyur pa ni ngo mtshar te/ de nas sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar dbul ba'i sdug
bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so/ /sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun gcad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su bskyab pa dang / mi
khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad gcad pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam gyi rgyud du phyin par bgyi ba dang / lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan
gyi yul gyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba dang / 'dus byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yongs su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su bstan
pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /bsod nams dang ye
shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / smon lam chen po'i
stobs yongs su bskyed par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu 'thob par bgyi ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang / theg
pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing snang bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa shes shing snang ba thob
par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
sa gnan pa la thogs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /'phags pa/ ting 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yongs su thob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ting 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang ba ste/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'o/ /rigs
kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu
bsgoms na/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ting nge
'dzin 'di'i yul der bas sam ma bas/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa la thogs pa med do/ /
'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnon pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan pa la
thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas blta zhing
rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brtag pa la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya
ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/ /sangs
rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ma 'dres pa shes shing khong du
chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /phyogs bcur 'jug
cing rjes su bgrang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjes su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su brtag
par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang pa la thogs pa med do/ /byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs
rgyas blta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med
do| |sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can gyi dbang po thams cad shes par bya ba la thogs
pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu /kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la blo gros rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la rig pa rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes can/ blo shin tu yangs
pas tshad med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzungs chen po'i snang ba la dbang bsgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa mngon par
shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu 'byung ba/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ ngag snyan pa sa'i
snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ spyod yul bstan pa'am/ yul rab tu brjod
pa'am/ smon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par bsngags pa'am/ 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su snang bar bya ba'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa mngon par brjod pa'am/ lam
yongs su bstan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/ sems kyi yul shes par bya ba'am/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya bar nus re
skan| song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan
pa zhes bya ba zhig /grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i shar phyogs logs na yod de/ de na shes las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'od bzang gi
chung ma/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong rgya
mtsho'i rgyal mtshan las snying po yongs su blangs te/ chos kyis nye bar 'tsho bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/ snang ba thob pa ye shes snang bar
gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mos pa rnam par dag pa khong du chud pa/ sems can chos kyi tshul gyi snang ba'i rjes su song ba/ rnam
par dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang ldan par gyur pa/ phyogs su ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu 'dal ba des/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi
bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ yang dang
yang lta zhing / yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / rab tu gdud pa dang / gus bar bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / yid la bya ba dang / bsam
pa dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / legs par brjod pa dang / ngo mtshar du bya ba dang / yon tan mngon du bya ba dang / rjes su bsngags pa dang / rjes su
'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su dran par bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / mi btang ba dang / yid la bsam pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug
par bya ba dang / mthong bar dga' ba dang / dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba dang / gzungs kyi rjes su bsam pa dang / ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang
ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi yul rjes su bsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / smon
lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul rnam par dpyad par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su gzung ba byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi
drung nas song ngo // //bam po dgu bcu gnyis pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyi yon tan gyis ni mgu/ dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du brlabs/ dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyi gdams ngag la ni nan tan du byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba ni rjes su sems/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung
gnas tsam du lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos
rjes su lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas nam mkha' blta ba la mig tsam du lta zhing mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas/ rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa'i bza'
shing gi rab kun nas rnam par brgyan pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ des mthong mthong ba/ bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa rin po che thams cad kyi ra bas
kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba spel legs pas yongs su brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi phreng ba'i me tog srad bu yid du 'ong ba'i sprin
rab tu 'phrul bas gzhi rgyas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis yang dag par brgyan pa/ shing thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su
gang ba/ spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngad zhim pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba 'phyang
ba rab tu 'byung zhing char ltar mngon par 'bab pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing spa la rgya cher brgyan pa'i
gzhi can/ yid bzhin gyi gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gam yo khebs shing mdzes par brgyan pa/ sil snyan gyi shing thams cad
las| lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil snyan rlung gis bskyod cing sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba/ sa'i gzhi mthon dman med par gnas pa/ rgyan gyi
shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad par rgyun du 'byung zhing 'phyang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen
po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun kyang / nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / khang pa
brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las brtsegs pa'i bde dang ldan pa dang / gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcug gdung rin po che rnam par snang
pa las bres pa dang / rdzing bu brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad las gzhi blangs te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pha gus mu khyud byas pa/ rin
po che thams cad kyi them skas btags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ gser gyi bye mas kun tu gram
pa| gzhi nor bu rin po che chu 'dang kun tu bkram pa/ phyogs bzhi nas them skas rnam par bres pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba dang / ngang dur dang / rma bya dang /
khu byug dang / khrung khrung dang / ka la ping+ka dang / ku na la'i sgra skad snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ta la'i phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas
kun nas yog pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ steng nas rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ra bas yongs su bskor
ba| rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng ba/ lu ma brgya stong phrag bcu dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam gyis mtha'
'khor ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa'i pad+mos yongs su khyab pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo'i 'od chen pos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa
ste| bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba sa'i gzhi rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las blangs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i
ka ba bkye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phags pa nor bu rin po che 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas brgyan pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar
ba grangs med pa'i ra bas bres pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po mi pham pa'i spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas bdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri'i ngad kun tu ldang
ba| rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam par gsal bar byed pas/ dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs
der stan grangs med cing tshad med pa bting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin
po che rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang /
nor bu rin po che seng ge'i shing thags pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can
dang | nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'od kyi rgyan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin
po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon
pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag bshams shing bting ba ste/ gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i ba gam mang po yang rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa
las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzes shing gzugs yod du 'ong ba dag go /bza' shing gi ra ba kun
nas brgyan pa de steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs pa ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang / 'khri shing gi bla re dang / me tog gi bla re dang / phreng
ba'i bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang / gser gyi bla re dang / rgyan gyi bla re dang / rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang / glang po'i shugs dang ldan
pas sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par byas pa'o//
rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar rin po che dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba
dang | mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i dra ba dang / seng ge'i 'khri shing gi dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang / spos kyi
gzugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang / rin po che'i phreng ba'i dra ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa/ snang ba
chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang /
nor bu rin po che zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi dud pa 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu
rin po che pad+mo'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun
tu rnam par snang ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi sprin chen po'i snang ba dang / glog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang
ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtag tu snang bar byas pa'o/ /bza' shing gi ra ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char 'bab
pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba lha rdzas las 'das pa'i phreng ba dang lda ldi'i sprin chen po kun tu mched
pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos tshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin
brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klubs pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu mthong bar dga' ste/ 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/ lha mi'i
sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pos rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcus chos
mnyan pas sgom zhing 'ong ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa ste/ de na dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po la 'dug cing mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra
bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thogs pa/ lag pa la lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu thogs pa/ lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal gyi rang bzhin
gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par mdzes par gyur pa/ rna cha rin po che mthon thing dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba/ mgo nor bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzes par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i
gdong gi rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mgul 'khor thogs pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar
ba| srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tu btud de/ phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de'i drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po'am/ tshangs
lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ rab 'phrul dga'am/ 'phrul dga'i ris
su gtogs pa'am/ rab dga' ldan nam/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ rab mtshe ma'am/ mtshe ma'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po'am/ sum
cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i dbang po'am/ dri za'am/ grul bum gyi dbang po'am/ grul bum
mam| klu'i dbang po'am/ klu'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'i dbang po'am/
mi'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ gshin rje'am/ gshin rje'i bu mo'am/ yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/
yi dwags sam/ mi'i dbang po'am/ mi yang rung ste/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /
byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs
nas kyang tshangs pa chen po'am/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas/ mi'i dbang
po'am/ mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong ba de dag nad sna tshogs shig gis btab pas/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs
la mngon par zhen tam/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang / de dag gis dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de mthong ma thag tu nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar
gyur| sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang yang bral bar gyur/ lta ba'i gsal shing yang phyin par gyur/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par shigs par gyur/
rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa yang khong du chud par gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab tu byang bar 'gyur/
dbang po'i myu gu thams cad kyang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par gzhol bar gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho
thams cad la'ang 'jug par gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon sum du gyur/ smon lam gyi sgo thams cad kyang yang dag par skye bar gyur/ spyod
pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar gyur/ yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rnam par dag par gyur/ sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes
pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshul du 'byung bar gyur/ lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad du rjes su 'gro bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang bza'
shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthong nas de dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der
stong ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor
ba byas nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar
byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na/ 'phags ma/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan med pa/ bde ba'i rgyal
mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o/ /mnyan na don yod pa'o/ /rim gror byas pa don yod pa'o/ /gnas gcig na 'grogs
pa don yod pa'o/ /rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
ma zin pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo
mthong btsam gyis ni/ sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ kho mo'i drung
du shar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag byon cing / gdan rin po che'i khri la bzhugs nas chos ston to/ /shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu nas kyang de
bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs
pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal pa mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par
brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gzhan gang
'di na gnas pa de dag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag ste/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal
pa mnyam pa dag go /smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid cig nas thugs bskyed/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mos ni/ sngon
gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de
bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung na/ kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de kho mos mchod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa kho mos
yongs su bzung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la'ang kho mo rab tu byung ngo / /chos kyi 'khor lo yang kho mos bzung
ngo| |de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/ de yang kho mos bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba
byung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byung ngo / /de'i
snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin
gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu/ gzhung de ltar tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa
dang | bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dab chags su bsams te dran par byas
na| gang kho mos rim gror byas te bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / gang gi spyan sngar kho mos chos thos par gyur pa dang / gang gi bstan pa la kho
mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rjes su dran te/ rigs kyi bu/ de phan chad du kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji
snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang
chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ snying rje chen po'i khongs su 'gro pa thams cad chud pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs
kyi bu/ smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zad zad du 'gro bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byams pa chen pos 'gro
ba thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing thams cad du bskal pa
thams cad yongs su sdud pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
lam las phyir mi ldog pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khong
du chud par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul khong du chud par byed cing /
yang dag par 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa
dang | mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes
pa'i stobs kyis tshig gcig brjod kyang / 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ lus rnam par
dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /nor bzang gis smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod ji
srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gcig la
dmigs shing gdul bar bya ba dang / smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/ sems can brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma
yin| sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/
sems can thams cad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can gang+gA'i phyir ma yin/ sems can ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
phyar phyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byang bying gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyal phyol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol
gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ljad ljod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod zim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyad phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldam ldem gyi phyir ma
yin| sems can ya gangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can cho ma'i phyir ma yin/ sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nab nub
kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgyud yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra yar gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gsal yas kyi
phyir ma yin/ sems can gzhal brtag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lum gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rab rib kyi
phyir ma yin/ sems can thab thib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'grigs yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can them 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod
kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'dra mnyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brang breng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrod yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyas 'dal gyi
phyir ma yin/ sems can bsngo yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zang yag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phro ba bkye'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rtse 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/
sems can yong then gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brug g.yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thing yug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can
snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nan pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yid 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can nab neb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrig thams kyi phyir
ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thug yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yad yud kyi phyir ma yin/
sems can phyo ldog gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhub be'i phyir ma yin/ sems can thag thug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can
khrig ga'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rig yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snyad med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mchog phreng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir
ma yin| sems can spu 'phyes kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod 'os kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhod yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
can brjod phul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zhi snyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ngag thim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyar nyer
gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can zal zul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sal sul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can g.yo ldeg gi
phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brnang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rem 'drol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems
can rdzi ngad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phun yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol 'ol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
ngad ngad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang brtsi'i phyir ma yin/ sems can zab bgrang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dga' rgyang gi phyir ma yin/ sems
can grangs mtha'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gdab yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
can gcal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byi ma 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yam me'i phyir ma yin/ sems
can bsnyal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldab ldeb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ban chad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phung gi phyir ma yin/
sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyud lding gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yun 'gyangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma yin/
sems can bun lob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lom gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/
sems can ljab ljib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi brtsal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'byams yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nga 'grang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can
smos yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra chal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lo rgyas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bum rdib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can le lo'i phyir ma
yin| sems can phyam phyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang 'phyos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas kyi phyir
ma yin/ sems can dpag yas la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal
gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
mi 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/
sems can mtha' 'byams kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byams la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag gi phyir
ma yin/ sems can dpag thag la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems
can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jig
rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi
phyir ma yin/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gi 'jig
rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang
brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad
du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /'di lta ste/
sangs rgyas gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin
pa dang / sangs rgyas bcu bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas| brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig
rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang
chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing
rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma
yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig
rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang
chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs
su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug
pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kyi sangs rgyas rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas /sangs
rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs
pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin
pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang
po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud
par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi
bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug
bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya
ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i
phyir| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho
thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par
bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub
tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa/ lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror
bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam la mngon par mos pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i phyir /byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi shugs drag po skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug
par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yi dam brtan pa skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams
cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par mos pa 'byung ba yin/ 'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i
phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo ma lus pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi spro ba skye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'char ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi
