snang ba 'byung ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sprin
chen po kun nas 'du ba yin/ rigs kyi bu/ mdor na de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul dang / sgo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu dag /byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni ye shes khong du chud par
bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni yongs su dag par bya ba'i
phyir| zhing thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na kho mos ni bdag gi smon lam nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang
du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog cig /bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog cig /bdag
gi smon lam ma sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / bdag la nyal ba'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog
cig ces de ltar smon lam btab bo/ smras pa/ 'phags ma/ rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rnam par thar pa 'di
ni nyon mongs pa med pa/ bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mos kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de gcig pu shes par zad
na| byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir sems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i phyir ri
rab dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sos par byed pa'i phyir sman gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i
mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i gnas su gyur pas ba lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed pa'i phyir
rlung du gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba 'byin pa'i phyir mar mer gyur pa/ zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi char yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'debs
pa'i phyir sprin du gyur pa/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir brgya phyin lta bu de
dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rnam pa mtha'
dang dbus med pa yongs su bstan par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu /lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa 'di na/ yul chu ba gtsang ma zhes bya ba yod de/
de na drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la dris shig dang / des rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon
gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du
mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ phyag 'tshal nas ngo mchi mas gang bar ngus te/ byang chub mchog tu dkon pa rjes su sems shing / dge
ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro bya ba dkon par rjes su bsdam pa dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thob par
bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / skal ba mnyam pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
dang 'phrad pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mos shing sems nges par gzhog pa dkon par rjes su
bsdam pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon par rjes su bsdam pa dang / sems dri ma med cing mi 'phrogs pa'i sbyor ba
yang dag par bsgrub pa dka' bar rjes su bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par skyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon par rjes su bsam
pa byed cing / dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag gi rjes su song ba'i sems dang
ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya
ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag po rab tu snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa| chos kyi gter 'thob par bya la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems
dang ldan pa/ smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan
pa| chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par
rnam par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches mi choms pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' zhing
thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de/ mthar gyis yul chu ba gtsang ma ga la ba der phyin nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/ de'i tshe drang
song 'jigs mchog dbyangs/ dge ba sbyang ba'i gnas shing dang / shing phran sna tshogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba/
lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gis kun nas 'grigs pa/ rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can/ rtag tu shing tog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing tog gi
shing dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing drung / nor bu rin po che'i spang leb kyis rtag tu gshibs pa dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam
par bres pa/ a ga ru yid du 'ong ba'i shing las spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas shing pa ta la rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongs su
brgyan pa/ n+ya gro da'i shing dbyibs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing las rtag tu shing thog smin pa 'brul ba/ me tog gi tshal pad+mo dang / ut+pa la
gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs/ drang srong stong phrag bcus bskor
cing | tsan dan gyi yal gshin tu 'brel ba'i bya skyibs shig na/ thor tshugs kyi cod pan can/ pags pa dang / rtswa'i gos gyon pa/ shing shun gyi smad g.yogs
can| rtswa'i stan la 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs ga la ba der stong ste/ phyin nas yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang
phrad pa'i bsam pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/ thams cad
mkhyen pa'i sa la gzhog pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes rin
po che'i gling du skyel bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang
dag par bskyed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag par lta/ nyam nyes med par thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
yongs su ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar me ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed
pas| thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stegs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis sim
pa yongs su skyed pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ snying rje chen po yongs su bskyed pas/ thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid gsal bar mthong ba ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas/ lus thams cad kyis phab ste/ phyag byas nas langs te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog
dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de/ 'di skad ces smras
so| |'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /
zhes thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol
de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /byis pa dag /rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa la mgron du gnyer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni sems can thams
cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du sta gon du gnas pa ste/ ye shes rgya mtsho mngon du gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char btung bar 'dod pa'o/ /
chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o/ /ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o/ /snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o/ /chos kyi char chen
po mngon par dbab par 'dod pa'o/ /ye shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu gzhil bar 'dod pa'o/ /sems
can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel bar 'dod pa'o/ /de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis/ me tog dri zhim la yid du 'ong zhing / kha dog sna tshogs
dang ldan pa mang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par phyag 'tshal te/ rab tu
btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /'di ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal
ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig
rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/ /sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skem par 'gyur ro/ /sred pa'i
'ching ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi khor yug gis 'jig
rten yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongs su ston par 'gyur ro/ /ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi mig rnam par
sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten rnams la mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ byis pa de dag la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /byis pa dag /gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams
cad kyi bde ba rab tu bskyed de/ rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byis pa dag /rigs kyi bu 'dis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu sems bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu
nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o/ /nor bzang gis smras pa/ byang chub
sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshong dpon
gyi bu nor bzang gi mgo la byugs nas/ lag pa g.yas pas bzung ngo / /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pas bzung
ma thag tu de'i mod la/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te/
de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung na/ bdag nyid 'dug pa shes par gyur
to| |sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang / rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan par mthong ngo / /de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can/ rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod par mthong ngo / /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar bas brgyan pa dag bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig las kyang / phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan
pa nyan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to/ /chos kyi sprin gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la
rab ba pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam/ mos pa sna tshogs kyi stobs kyis rnam par sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la yang zhugs
so| |sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la'ang zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba
bzhin du tshim par 'gyur bar rnam par dmigs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'dod chags dang bral ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi
dkyil 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes snang ba bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pas zhugs so/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes mi zad
pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi sgo snang ba/ phyogs kun gyi dra ba rab tu thob pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin
gyi ye shes brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa/ gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying
po yul du gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i
mu khyud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni nyin zhag gcig lon par shes so/ /la lar ni nyin zhag bdun lon pa snyam/ la lar ni zla ba phyed lon pa snyam/
la lar ni zla ba gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong lon
pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo byed ba stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la
lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya lon pa
snyam| la lar ni bskal pa stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa
bye ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag
khrig brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed lon par gyur
pa snyam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/ bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ bskal pa sangs rgyas
kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed par gyur to/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
btang ba dang / des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi mdun na 'dug par shes par gyur to/ /de la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/
dran mod/ smras pa/ 'phags pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dran no/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i
rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dus
thams cad du 'khor lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ye shes mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i nyi ma la rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan rab tu
'god pa/ dus gsum gyi yul skad cig gcig gis ye shes su yang dag par sdud pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par bkram pa/ chos kyi dbyings
thams cad la/ ye shes snang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par
langs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pas rnam par dpyod pa dang mthun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa 'dod pa bzhin du kun tu snang zhing dri ma med la/ 'od dang
ldan pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ zhing gi mngon par 'du bya
ba shes pa'am/ ye shes kyi yul la 'jug par bya ba'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi rjes 'brang bar bya ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par
bya ba'am/ rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/ lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba'am/ dbyangs
kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod pa'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu bstan par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul yongs su
tshol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shing / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ drang
srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/
yang dang yang bltas te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas song ngo // //bam po dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab
pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mngon sum gyi ye shes kyis mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyis sems snang bar gyur pa/ dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/
'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
snang ba thob pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod yul la rnam par spyod pa mngon du gyur pa/ gnyis su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du
bstan pa'i ye shes lhur len pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ mnyam pa thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par
dag pa la mos pa'i mdzod la mkhas pa/ rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang
bzhin bsgom pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba'i
'od rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings brjod pa la mngon par mos pas ngoms pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul la
'jug pa khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon
lam gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa rnam par spyad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba mi zad pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon
du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa'i yul mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dmigs pa phra ba dang / yangs pa'i khongs su chud par bya ba la yang
dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dra ba sna tshogs yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su rnam par spyad pa rnam par gdags
pa mtha' yas pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa tha dad pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can rnam par
phye ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la yang dag par
blta ba dang / sems can dang / phyogs dang / dus mtha' yas pa'i ming gi rnam pa sna tshogs la yang dag par blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mngon du bya ba byed cing / mthar
gyis yul tshol ba dang ldan pa gang na ba dang / bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ga la ba der phyin to/ /de'i tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa'i gzhir byas shing dka' thub drag po la spyod de/ de'i phyogs bzhi nas me'i phung po ri rab tsam du che ba bus pa dang / ri shin tu mtho ba'i g.yang sa'i
lam gyi rgyud spu gri'i sos gshibs pas 'khod par snang ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
te| mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang
chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag
dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ song la spu gri'i so dang ra ba'i ri 'di la 'dzegs te/ me'i 'obs 'dir mchongs shig dang / des khyod
kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par ldog pa
yang shin tu dkon/ mir 'gyur te/ khom pa phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang shin tu dkon/ dbang po nyams su med pa yang
shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa yang shin tu dkon/ skyes bu dam pa dang phrad pa yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang shin tu dkon/ yang
dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan pas legs par sdud pa yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag par 'tsho bar bya ba yang shin tu dkon/ mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang gnyen ba'i chos la nan tan
byed pa yang shin tu dkon na/ de skad zer zhing bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad la zhugs la/ de ltar bdag gi srog gcad par brtson pa 'di bdud dam zhig ma yin nam/ bdud
kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'am/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar brdzus pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi gcags pa byed pa zhig ma
yin grang / bdag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gegs byed par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag lam gol ba ngan par gzhug par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag
gis sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la gegs byed pa zhig ma yin grang snyam nas/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed
pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcu steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta bu'i sems mi brtan par ma byed cig /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags
pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/ brtson 'grus ldog pa med pa'o/ /brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba la zhugs pa'o/ /'gro ba thams
cad kyi sred pa'i rlan bskam pa la mngon par brtson pa'o/ /lta ba'i rnam pa dang / dra ba thams cad gtub pa la brtson pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i lcag lcig thams cad zad par
bsreg pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /mi khom mi shes pa'i bas mtha'i dgon pa thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi rga shi'i g.yang sa dang /
'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa la yi dam brtan pa'o/ /dus gsum gyi mun pa bsal pa la mngon par brtson pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi 'od zer dgye ba la zhugs pa'o/ /
rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa ji snyed cig mkhan po dang / dbang sgyur ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad
kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhing / sems pa blta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa de dag thams cad/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi thugs
dam gyi mthus/ rang rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba med cing / de dag bsam gtan gyi ro dga' ba myong ba med pas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /de dag phyin pa dang /
'phags pa 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin dang / drag shul kyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi sa zil gyis mnan te/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / nga rgyal
dang | rlom sems thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi bsam pa
brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par blta ba la mngon par brtson par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad du grag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la thogs pa med cing / bsgribs pa med par bya ba'i phyir
chos ston to/ /bdud stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po ches mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di
dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po byung zhing / kho bo cag gi khyim dang / lus dang /
rgyan gyi longs spyod thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang so so'i gnas gnas na bag dga' ba med pas 'khor dang bcas te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du
'dong ngo / /kho bo cag 'di'i drung du phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la ci nas kyang / rang rang gi sems sor chud nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar chos ston to/ /dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcus kyang / lha rdzas kyi me
tog gis mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba byed pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas
na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /bdag cag drung du phyin pa dang / 'di ni bdag cag la rang rang gi
sems la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba la dbang
bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba
dang / yo byad la dbang ba'i rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshe la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal
po stong phrag bcu yang / steng gi bar snang la 'khod de/ lha rdzas kyi glu yang dag par sbyar ba'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs bsgrags te/ mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer
to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di las de dang 'dra ba'i 'od byung zhing kho bo cag gi gzhal med khang 'di
dag rnam par dag ste/ gsal ba dang / 'od shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyan 'di dag dang / lha'i bu mo 'di dag kyang / rnam par dag cing gsal la 'od shin tu dang bar
'gyur ro/ /de bas na bdag cag kyang lha'i bu dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas par/ 'dod pa la dga' bar tshor ba med de/ 'dod pa'i bde ba la mngon par
dga' ba med pas/ lus dang sems sim par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dod pa yin te/ 'phags pa 'di ni/ bdag cag de ltar phyin pa rnams la sems rnam par
dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /sems kyi 'od dang bar bya ba dang / sems shin tu dag par bya ba dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang /
sems kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes 'thob pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sangs
rgyas kyi sku tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par bya ba'i phyir ngag rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu thob par bya bar sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bu dang / lha'i
bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang / steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab pas mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal
nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de
ltar dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin pa rnams la/ 'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /chog shes
pa'i sems su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyod pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra
ba'i char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan
pa la dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par
bzlog par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin stong phrag bcu so so nas nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis
dang | lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad
ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang brgya byin gyi khang pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / rtse ba'i
nags tshal dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang / gam yo na glu len pa'i longs spyod la dga' ba med/ de ltar bdag cag
dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /bdag cag der phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spang pa'i phyir
chos ston to/ /'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te/ mi brtan zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do/ /dregs pa dang / bag med pa
thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang 'dis bltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo
thams cad kyang g.yo bar 'gyur te/ des bdag cag gshigs pas sems skyo bar gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems brtan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
su smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/ /klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang / dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo la sogs pa klu brgya stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la gnas
shing | dus dang mthun pa'i lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi sprin dang / klu'i bu mos blangs pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs dang / lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pa'i char
mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po 'byung
ste| des klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ bye ma'i char dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongs su sel to/ /khro ba 'byung ba yang zhi bar byas te/ lus sim par byas
nas yid shin tu mos par byed do/ /de ltar sems shin tu mos par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la chos ston te/ /'di ltar klu'i lam gyi rgyud ngan pa rnam par
smad pa dang / sgrib pa'i las thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir nyes pa 'chags su btsud cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu yang nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod de/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bram ze rgyal ba'i
drod kyi skye mched dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la mchod pa byas nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i
pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi 'khor kun kyang mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar gyur te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang ldan
par gyur to/ /de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'tsho ba med pa la zhugs pa rnams kho bo cag gi drung du 'ong ngo / kho bo cag kyang de ltar
byams pa'i dbang gis zil gyis non pas/ rang rang gi gnas de dang / de dag na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ 'phags
pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /bdag cag de ltar 'ongs pa rnams la/ 'phags pa 'di'i sku las byung ba'i 'od kyis lus thams cad snang bar byas shing bde bas khyab par
mdzad de/ de ltar bdag cag lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang bdag cag la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / lus srul
po mang po byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /dri za'i dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs
kyi bu/ kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung bar mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di las 'od byung ste/ bdag
cag gi gnas snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar bdag cag 'od des phog ste/ bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag
cag drung du phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni/ bdag cag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /lha ma
yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'thon te/ nam mkha' la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad
ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rgya mtsho dang rir bcas pa'i sa chen po'i
dkyil 'khor rab tu g.yo bar gyur te/ bdag cag kun gyi nga rgyal dang / rlom sems dang / dregs pa thams cad brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi zil gyis non te/ 'phags
pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni/ bdag cag la g.yo sgyu thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / chos zab mo'i bzod pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid
la rab tu dgod pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi
dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang / bram ze'i bu shin tu sdug gu'i gzugs su mngon par sprul te/ /'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs
su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las 'od chen po byung ste/ bdag cag gis gnas snang bar byas nas yongs su g.yo bar byed do/ /
des bdag cag kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste/ skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / 'phags pa 'di yang bdag cag la chos ston cing /
byams pa chen po la yang dag par sbyor bar mdzad do/ /snying rje chen po la yang dag par dgod pa mdzad do/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa la yang yang dag par sbyor ba
mdzad do/ /'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par bya ba la yang yongs su sbyor ba mdzad do/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag par bya ba la
yang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do/ /shes rab dang thabs shin tu gsal ba la yang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do/ /rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su smin par bya ba'i sems can rnams
gdul bar bya ba la yang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do/ /mi'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod do/ /'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags
pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las dril bu'i dra ba rin po che'i srad bus lda ldir brgyus
pa'i sil snyan dang / rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo / /chos kyi sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam gyi sgra 'byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming
'di zhes bya ba zhig byang chub tu smon lam 'debs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig dka' ba yongs
su gtong ba byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dkyil
'khor yongs su sbyong ba byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig snying po byang chub tu 'gro'o/ /
'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i bdud rab tu pham par byas te/
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes
bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ni che ge
mo zhig sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma lus par mdzad nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad do zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rigs kyi
bu| 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba'i char blags pa'i mur thug par ni rung yang srid kyi/ de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gnas
na yod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim gyi longs spyod rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing / nga ro 'byin pa dang / rna lam
du grag pa'i mtha' ni thug par mi rung ngo / /de ltar bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam
dang | spyod pa dang / mtshan gyi chu klung gi sgras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos nyams bde ba skyes te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dod do/ /de ltar bdag cag phyin par
gyur nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la ci nas kyang kho bo cag gi 'khor gyi sems can du ma zhig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa mdzad do/ /'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa/ kha dog shin tu mdzes pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'khod cing /
yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las rnam pa 'di lta
bu'i 'od 'byung ste/ 'od des mar na mnar med pa yan chad du sems can dmyal ba rnams snang bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug
bsngal rtse zil bar byas te/ 'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag cag gi mig lam du snang bar bstan pas/ de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems mos par
gyur nas 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i ris nyams su bde bar skyes so/ /de ltar bdag cag kyang 'phags pa 'di'i mdzad pa la drin du gzo zhing mthong bas mi ngoms pas/ 'dod
pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /der bdag cag phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang sems can tshad med pa rnams
byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di
lta bu thos nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes
bskyed| bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyi bka' dang 'gal bar bgyis pa'i nongs pa la nongs par bshags so/ /de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rjes su bstan dang mthun byed cing / /dran pa nye bar bzhag ste bla ma'i ngag gcog mi byed na/ /de'i phyir de yi
don rnams thams cad mthun par 'grub par 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'tshang yang rgya/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ ri
g.yang sa'i lam spu gri'i so gshibs pa la 'dzegs te/ me'i phung po chen po der mchongs so/ /de de ltar mchongs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin
tu brtan pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/ /me des reg nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas/ des
'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ me'i phung po la de ltar reg na bde ba dang / ri'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di yang de ltar reg na bde ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /des smras pa/
rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar
pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams
cad yongs su zad par bya ba'i smon lam can/ ru mtshon phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ sems la thub pa med cing / sems dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa/ yid zhum pa med pa
can rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i mthu bo che lta bu/ brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba la sgyid lug pa med pa/ sbyor ba lhod pa med pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu/ 'gro ba
thams cad kyi don du brtson pa/ brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan
song | rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi
bu mo byams ma zhes bya ba/ bu mo lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi drung nas
song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa/ theg pa chen
po la mngon du phyogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang bar spro ba/
chos kyi rim gro la rnam par spyod pa/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa/ ye shes kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa'i yul
dang ldan pa/ dus gsum skad cig gi cha shas la khong du chud par byed pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam par gdon mi za ba thob
pa| chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ bsgribs pa med pa'i mthas gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa/ chos kyi mtha' dang mi 'gal bar bya ba la
gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' la mtha' med par khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du
shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes la gzhol ba/ zhing la mngon par chags pa thams cad dang bral ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa
med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas pa med par spyod pa/ sems can thams cad la bdag med pa dang / sems can
med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ sgra thams cad tshig gi lam lta bur khong du chud pa/ gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par rnam par rig par bya ba la
gzhol ba de mthar gyis seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer gang na ba der phyin te/ bu mo byams ma tshol zhing yongs su rmed rmed pa las/ rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byams
ma| 'khor bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pa de khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nang na/ khri tsan dan sprul gyi snying po'i rkang pa can/ gser gyi lcags
bod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan bting ba la 'dug cing chos ston to zhes thos nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ rgyal po seng ge'i dpal
gyi gnas gang na ba der phyin nas/ rgyal po'i phyi sgo'i sgo khang na/ bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba'i phyir sdod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang / des der srog chags brgya phrag du ma dang /
srog chags stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma 'dong ba mthong nas/ khyed gang nas 'ong / da gang du 'dong zhes dris pa dang / de dag na re/ ded ni bu mo byams
ma'i drung du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dong ngo zhes nas/ des bsams pa/ 'dir ni su 'gro yang dag pa med pa lta zhig snyam ste/ de yang nang du phyin to/ /de ltar phyin te bltas
na| khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po can de yang / gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te/ bai DUR+Ya'i ka ba bkye ba/ rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi lhun
dang ldan pa'i ba gam brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa nor bu rin po che grangs med pas rnam par bris pa/ rin po che stong gi snying po'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu spa bar
byas pa/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing rta grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/ gser gyi dril bu brgya stong shin tu 'khrol ba'i sgra
snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan par 'dug par mthong ngo / /bu mo byams ma de yang mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog
ltar 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ mdun du 'dug nas 'di
skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos
pa| 'phags ma/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi
bu| kho mo'i gnas kyi rgyan la ltos shig ces nas/ des kun tu yul te bltas pa dang / rtsig pa re re dang / ka ba re re dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang / rnam pa'i bye brag re
re dang / dbyibs re re dang / nor bu rin po che re re dang / gser gyi dril bu re re dang / rin po che'i shing re re dang / ba sbu'i bu ga re re dang / rin po che'i sen mo do re re dag las
kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ thog ma thugs bskyed pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang smon lam gyi yul dang bcas pa/ 'byung ba'i
rgyan dang bcas pa/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pa dang bcas par
gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar gyur to/ /dmigs pa de dag re re las/ ji lta ba de bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ chus
yongs su gang ba'i mtsho dang zhing rnyog pa med pa la rnam par gsal ba la ni/ nam mkha' nyi zla dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang
ngo| |de bzhin du khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po 'di dmigs pa re re las kyang / chos kyi dbyings kun na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan
gyi tshul du yongs su snang bar gyur te/ de ni bu mo byams ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te/ des de ltar rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyan gyi mtshan ma
de yongs su bzung ste thal mo sbyar nas/ bu mo byams ma'i gdong du bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par
brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud 'di ni/ kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed las yongs su btsal ba
ste| de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di/ sgo sna tshogs kyi khong du chud par bya bas rtogs par mdzad
de| gcig gis gang du gsungs pa de yang gnyis kyis ma gsungs so/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di'i yul
ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di la/ kho mo mngon du byed cing / sems pa dang / rjes
su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / rjes su sems pa dang / dran par bya ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / rnam par brtags pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
yang dag par brgyan par bya ba dang / rab tu rnam par dbye ba byed pa'i tshe/ gzungs kun nas sgo zhes bya ba yongs su skye ste/ gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor der ni chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs
med pa phrag bcu yongs su 'du'o/ /khong du chud do/ /mngon du 'gyur ro/ /mngon par 'du'o/ /khongs na 'khod do/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sems can gyi sgo dang / 'das pa'i sgo dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang / da ltar byung ba'i sgo dang / gnas pa'i mtha' sgo
dang | bsod nams kyi sgo dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo
dang | spyod pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su 'byung ba'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang / las kyi sgo dang / las dang mi
'gal pa'i sgo dang / las kyi rgyun gyi sgo dang / lam mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / mi mnyam pa'i las yongs su spang pa'i sgo dang / yang dag pa'i las la nan tan du bya ba'i sgo dang /
las la dbang bsgyur ba'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa yang dag par blang ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin khong du chud par bya
ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin spyod yul gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgo dang / sems rgya
mtsho'i sgo dang / sems kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo dang / sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi thibs po snang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi mtsho dang bar bya ba'i sgo
dang | sems 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems rnam par rgyu ba'i sgo dang / sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo
dang | mos pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang / sems

can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / phyogs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi phyogs kyi sgo dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo dang / byams pa chen po'i sgo dang / zhi ba'i sgo dang / ngag gi lam gyi sgo dang /
tshul gyi sgo dang / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / yang dag par 'du ba'i sgo dang / chags pa med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / kun gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos

kyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi sgo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo dang /
'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten kun nas gnas pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo
dang | 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa nyid du khong du
chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhi'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i sgo dang / mig 'phrul du 'jug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
rgyud kyi sgo dang / gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par gyur pa'i sgo dang / phra ba rgya chen por khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rgya chen po phra bar khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs
rgyas mthong bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor
rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i
nges pa'i tshig gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba'i sgo dang /

sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang /
sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sems can pha rol gyi sems thugs su chud pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / dga' ldan gyi pho
brang na bzhugs pa'i sgo nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pa'i bar gyi sgo dang / sems can gyi don tshad med pa mdzad pa'i sgo dang / chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo dang / chos sna tshogs

kyi tshul gyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / smon
lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / gzungs rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / ye shes kyi dkyil
'khor rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / shes rab yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / dran pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dag ste/ rigs
kyi bu/ de ltar kho mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud dran pas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems
dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ blo gros chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa/ rgyud bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa/
'jig rten gyi chos yongs su mi rgyu ba/ ye shes snang ba'i mig rab rib med pa rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad mun pa med par khong du chud pa/ blo nam mkha' ltar
tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mig can/ chags pa med pa'i sa snang ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi don rab tu dbye ba la
mkhas pa zil gyis gnon la/ 'jig rten kun gyis zil gyis mi non pa/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i tshul la rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad na kha na ma tho
med pa/ 'jig rten gyi don byed pa la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngag gi tshul dang rnam pa la mkhas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du gnas
pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa ston pa/ dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan
brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mig gsum pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song
la| ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dri sa shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ bu mo byams
ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bu mo byams ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ bu mo byams ma'i drung nas song ngo //
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyod pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zab mo khong du chud par bya ba rjes su
bsam pa dang / sems can gyi ye shes shin tu phra zhing zab pa rjes su bsam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i
dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rang bzhin
gyis bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi
dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / lus kyi 'khrul 'khor shugs kyis 'khor ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / las kyis sna tshogs su
gyur pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa byed cing / mthar gyis yul mig gsum pa gang na ba der phyin te/ yul gyi 'khor dang / grong khyer gyi 'khor dang / tshong 'dus kyi
'khor dang / grong rdal gyi 'khor dang / yul gru'i 'khor dang / lhas kyi 'khor dang / drang srong dge ba spyod pa'i gnas kyi 'khor dang / yul dang / phyogs kyi 'khor dang / chu'i rgyud kyi
'khor dang / ri'i sal sul gyi 'khor dang / nags tshal chen po'i 'khor dag tu dge slong blta na sdug pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ des dge slong blta na sdug pa nags tshal stug
po zhig na gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/ gzugs mdzes shing sdug la blta na yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon mthing g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug
pa| gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can dpral ba yangs pa/ mig dkar nag 'phyes shing ril la/ rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la ran par mdzes pa
dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lha
nga seng ge ltar 'dug pa/ mkhur ba shas gang zhing rgyas pa/ smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu'i zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/ rna shal
ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/ snying ga dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i stod
ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can/ rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam
zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rkang pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ brla zlum pa/ pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dwags e
na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs
su gyen du 'khyil ba/ shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ mig mi 'gebs shing mi rgod pa/ dran pa nye bar gnas
pa| ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar rtswa dang / nags tshal dang / sman dang / shing phran sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ blo shin tu yangs pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / yul la thub pa med
pa| dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sprin gyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/ g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / g.yeng ba dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul ma 'dres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po'i snang ba thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i bsam
pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs pa skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can thams cad
kyi ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rjes su dran zhing / 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du 'chag pa la zhugs te/ drag dal med cing pad ral
med la/ shin tu mdzes par 'chag pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gos dang ldan pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am
ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /dge slong blta na mdzes pa de
'chag pa'i tshe/ phyogs mngon du gyur pa'i phyogs kyi lha rnams phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sgrub par byed do/ /rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha rnams rin po che'i pad mos gom pa
'dor ba'i tshe/ yongs su blang ba byed do/ /me'i lha snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zad mi shes pa rnams kyang mun pa dang / rab rib rnam par sel to/ /'dzam bu rgyal mtshan gyi nags tshal gyi
lha rnams kyang me tog mang po char mngon par 'bebs so/ /sa'i lha mi g.yo ba'i snying po can rnams kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mang po ston to/ /nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba'i
dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyang nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su brgyan pa byed do/ /rgya mtsho'i lha dpal kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyang rin po che dam pa mang pos mngon par 'thor to/ /ri
rab gyi lha dri ma med pa'i snying po can rnams kyang thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /rlung gi lha thogs pa med pa'i stobs can rnams kyang spos dang / bdug spos dang / me tog 'thor ba'i rlung
rab tu 'gyed do/ /mtshan mo'i lha gnas par byed pa lus shin tu brgyan pa rnams kyang lus shin tu btud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyin mo'i lha rtag tu sad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor can
rnams kyang nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs shing / snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / dge slong
blta na sdug pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la/ spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la
bzhin sbyar te/ legs par phyis nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba zhig lags te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams
ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni tshes btab na dar la bab pa/ rab tu byung bas btab na gsar du zhugs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/
kho bos ni tshe de 'dra ba gcig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi drung du tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la
la'i zham ring du nyin zhag gcig tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do/ /la lar ni nyin zhag bdun du/ la lar ni zla ba phyed du/ la lar ni zla ba gcig tu/ la lar ni lo gcig tu/ la lar
ni lo brgyar/ la lar ni lo stong du/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong du/ la lar ni lo bye bar/ la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig tu/ la lar ni lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
du med par/ la lar ni bskal pa bar mar/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed du/ la lar ni bskal par bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni/ bskal pa brjod du
med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bskal pa bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las chos bstan pa thos te/ gdams ngag dang /
rjes su bstan pa yang dag par blangs so/ /smon lam gyi rgyan yongs su sbyangs so/ /yang dag par bsgrub pa'i yul la zhugs so/ /spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs so/ /pha rol
tu phyin pa rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par byas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par byas so/ /de dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba phan tshun
ma 'dres pa dag kyang yongs su gzung ngo / /de dag gi stobs mnyam pa nyid kyang khong du chud par byas so/ /de dag gi bstan pa yang dam pa'i chos zad pa'i mthar thug gi bar du yongs
su bzung ngo / /kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyang / smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis/ rang
gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so/ /kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang /
spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so/ /kho bos de bzhin gshegs
pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'ang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs so/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ kho bo
'chag sa 'di na 'chags pa'i tshe/ phyogs kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang shin tu rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi sgos mngon du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams
cad kyang / smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'da' zhing / yongs
su dag par bya ba'i phyir rnam par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig la sems can gyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / byang
chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur
ro| |sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa dag kyang snga phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i smon
lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba
dang | rim gro bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char rnams kyang / chos
kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis chos kyi tshul grangs med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir
bsam pa la mngon par 'bab bo/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur
ro| |sems bskyed pa gcig la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gcig tu/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yang dag par 'du
bar bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la
dbang po rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / dran pa'i mthar phyin pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs
pa'i stobs kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo dang / dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la dus kyi 'khor lo brjod
du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / sems can zad mi shes pa zad par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dus thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
bskor ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la dus rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad kyang / dus gcig tu rnam par dgod pa'i tshul
khong du chud pa'i ye shes snang ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum rnam par dgod pa'i phyir mngon sum du
'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa shin tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'
bsam pa rdo rje lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba/ srog gi dbang po la rgyun chad pa med pa/ ye shes kyi sgron ma zhi
bar 'gyur ba med pa/ mi shigs mi phyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i gzugs shin tu grub pa rgyu'i chos mnyam pa'i yan lag dang nying lag tu ldan pa'i lus
can| 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang
dbyibs dang / chu zheng yongs su ston pa/ me mdag dang / me lce dang / dug dang / mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing khor yug ltar thub pa med pa'i lus
can| bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi stobs kyi stobs med par byed pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus
dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par dmigs pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ sgo thams cad du rnam par dmigs shing thos par 'gyur ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis ngor blta ba/
chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ phyogs kun du rnam par snang ba/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor bas blta na mdzes pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
shin tu 'joms pas shin tu dpa' bar snang ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i rgyu mthun pa las byung bas blta na dga' ba/ 'byung bar shin tu dka' zhing dkon pas me tog u dum
wA ra lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul dge sbyong gi
dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba na/ grong khyer sgo bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang /
nan tan rnam par dag par bya ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snang bas sems shin tu snang bar gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa/ gzhan gyis mi
thub cing / brgal thag chad pa'i snying dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi go cha bzang pos sems zhum pa med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa brtan
pas kun tu gnas shing / yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems
dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su mi ngoms pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam mngon du gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams
cad kyi kha lo sgyur bas yongs su sdud par bdag nyid yongs su gtong bar 'dod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mtha'i dgon pa pa chen po las bzla bar 'dod pa/ dge ba'i
gshes gnyen blta ba dang / mnyan pa dang / bsnyen bkur bas yongs su mi ngoms pa/ chos kyi rim gro tshad med pa bskyed pa dang ldan pa des/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang
pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong blta na sdug pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i drung
nas song ngo // //bam po dgu bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge slong blta na sdug pa de'i gdams ngag rjes su zlos shing / spel ba dang /
bstud pa dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / bshad pa dang / so sor rnam par sgom pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'jug pa bya ba
dang | bkur ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / yang dang yang bzlas pa dang / shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / snang
bar bya ba dang / rjes su rnam par lta bar byed cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'khor dang bcas pa de mthar gyis yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor gyi grong
khyer sgo bzang po gang na ba der phyin te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ de'i steng gi bar snang las/ lha dang / klu dang /
gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis bos pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khye'u'i dbang po'i dbang phyug ni chu klung gi chu 'dus dang nye ba zhig na/ byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor te/ bye ma la rtse
bas rtse zhing 'dug go /zhes nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang grong khyer sgo bzang po dang nye ba'i chu klung gi chu 'dus gang na ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang / des khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug
byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor cing / bye ma la rtse bas rtse ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ga na ba der song ste/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang
pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug
ste thal mo sbyar nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan
pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du
gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ yi ge dang / grangs dang / brda dang / rtsis kyi tshul bslabs te/ bzo thams cad mngon par shes pa dang ldan
pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgor bcug go /de ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni 'jig rten na yi ge dang / ming gi rnam pa dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / brda dang / shol thabs shes par bya ba dang /
bzo sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / khams kyi cho ga dang / dug gso ba'i thabs dang / skem pa dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po'i gdon gyis btab pa gso ba dang / grong dang / grong
khyer dang / tshong 'dus dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / gnas rnam par dgod pa shes par bya ba dang / ra ba dang / khang pa dang / skar khung dang /
khang pa brtsegs pa'i tshad shes par bya ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / shing rta sbyar ba'i tshul sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / dge mi dge dang / 'jigs mi 'jigs kyi
ltas dang / mtshan ma shes par bya ba dang / rmos dang / tshong dang / rnam par spyad par sbyar ba'i cho ga shes par bya ba dang / sems can gyi yan lag dang / nying lag gi
mtshan gyi rgyud dang / rgyus dang / rnam par spyad pa shes par bya ba dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan song gi las kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i tshul shes par bya
ba dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang / tshogs mchod pa shes par bya ba dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan song gi tshogs shes par bya ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
kyi theg pa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang / rgyu dang / byed pa dang / sbyor ba'i rgyud shes par bya ba ji snyed pa de dag
thams cad shes te/ de dag la sems can yongs su gzung bar byed do/ /rab tu dgod par byed do/ /yongs su gzhog par byed do/ /slob tu 'dzud do/ /sbyong du 'dzud do/ /brtan par
byed do/ /lhur len par byed do/ /rdzogs par byed do/ /yongs su sgrub par byed do/ /yongs su spyod par byed do/ /gsal bar bstan par byed do/ /rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /
mtshan mar byed do/ /mthar phyin par byed do/ /rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /dri ma med par byed do/ /shin tu dag par byed do/ /'od gsal zhing dang bar byed do/ /shin tu yangs
par byed do/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsis kyi tshul shes pa de gang zhe na/ brgya stong phrag brgya na bye ba'o/ /bye ba bye ba na khod khod do/ /khod
khod khod khod na tha da dgu'o/ /thad dgu thad dgu na khrig khrig go /khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams so/ /thams thams thams thams na myad myid do/ /myad myid myad myid na
gang ya'o/ /gang ya gang ya na ban bun no/ /ban bun ban bun na phyar phyur ro/ /phyar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go /lcag lcig lcag lcig na byang bying ngo / /byang bying byang bying na chem
chem mo/ /chem chem chem chem na phyal phyol lo/ /phyal phyol phyal phyol na khyud khyud do/ /khyud khyud khyud khyud na zar zer ro/ /zar zer zar zer na khrib khrib bo/ /khrib khrib khrib khrib na
ya gangs so/ /ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o/ /cho ma cho ma na khram khrim mo/ /khram khrim khram khrim na nab nub bo/ /nab nub nab nub na sang sang ngo / /sang sang sang sang na brgyud
yas so/ /brgyud yas brgyud yas na btang yas so/ /btang yas btang yas na bkra yar ro/ /bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so/ /gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs med do/ /
mtshungs med mtshungs med na lam lum mo/ /lam lum lam lum na yal yol lo/ /yal yol yal yol na khral khrul lo/ /khral khrul khral khrul na thud thud do/ /thud thud thud thud
na bsam phyod do/ /bsam phyod bsam phyod na brang breng ngo / /brang breng brang breng na bgrod yas so/ /bgrod yas bgrod yas na bsngo yas so/ /bsngo yas bsngo yas na zang yag go/
zang yag zang yag na 'phro bkye'o/ /'phro bkye 'phro bkye na rtse 'phyo'o/ /rtse 'phyo rtse 'phyo na yong tan no/ /yong tan yong tan na brug g.yos so/ /brug g.yos
brug g.yos na sang yal lo/ /sang yal sang yal na 'thing yug go /'thing yug 'thing yug na yid 'phyo'o/ /yid 'phyo yid 'phyo na nab neb bo/ /nab neb nab neb na khrig thams
so| |khrig thams khrig thams na yal yal lo/ /yal yal yal yal na bgrad yas so/ /bgrang yas bgrang yas na thug yal lo/ /thug yal thug yal na shang shang ngo / /shang
shang shang shang na yag yag go /yag yag yag yag na tham thim mo/ /tham thim tham thim na rlom bsnyal lo/ /rlom bsnyal rlom bsnyal na gzhal 'phyos so/ /gzhal 'phyos
gzhal 'phyos na gzhal yal lo/ /gzhal yal gzhal yal na gzhal med do/ /gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to/ /gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal thim mo//
gzhal thim gzhal thim na gar gzhal lo/ /gar gzhal gar gzhal na gzhal sangs so/ /gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na gzhal thag go /gzhal thag gzhal thag na gzhal
phul lo/ /gzhal phul gzhal phul na gzhal zhi'o/ /gzhal zhi gzhal zhi na 'phyo 'gyur ro/ /'phyo 'gyur 'phyo 'gyur na nyar nyer ro/ /nyar nyer nyar nyer na phyag phyig go /phyag
phyig phyag phyig na zal zul lo/ /zal zul zal zul na sal sal lo/ /sal sal sal sal na g.yo ldeg go /g.yo ldeg g.yo ldeg na phan phun no/ /phan phun phan phun na brnang ya'o/ /
brnang ya brnang ya na rem 'drol lo/ /rem 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi ngad do/ /rdzi ngad rdzi ngad na rdzi rdul lo/ /rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo/ /phun yol phun yol na ngad ngad do/ /ngad
ngad ngad ngad na bgrang brtsi'o/ /bgrang brtsi bgrang brtsi na zab bgrang ngo / /zab bgrang zab bgrang na dga' rkyang ngo / /dga' rkyang dga' rkyang na gzhung 'dal lo/ /gzhung 'dal gzhung
'dal na khrug phyad do/ /khrug phyad khrug phyad na 'ol phyod do/ /'ol phyod 'ol phyod na gdab yas so/ /gdab yas gdab yas na gcal yas so/ /gcal yas gcal yas na bgrang yas
so| |bgrang yas bgrang yas na byim 'phyo'o/ /byim 'phyo byim 'phyon ya me'o/ /ya me ya me na bsnyal yas so/ /bsnyal yas bsnyal yas na ldab ldeb bo/ /ldab ldeb ldab ldeb na

'ban chad do/ /'ban chad 'ban chad na phang phung ngo / /phang phung phang phung na khye'u tsang ngo / /khye'u tsang khye'u tsang na zhung zung ngo / /zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo/ /mchog yal
mchog yal na mtha' rdul lo/ /mtha' rdul mtha' rdul na yun 'gyangs so/ /yun 'gyangs yun 'gyangs na bun lob bo/ /bun lob bun lob na lam lom mo/ /lam lom lam lom
na bsnyad yas so/ /bsnyad yas bsnyad yas na lang ling ngo / /lang ling lang ling na ljab ljib bo/ /ljab ljib ljab ljib na mi brtsal to/ /mi brtsal mi
