brtsal na 'byams yas so/ /'byams yas 'byams yas na nga 'grang ngo / /nga 'grang nga 'grang na smos yal lo/ /smos yal smos yal na bkra chal lo/ /bkra chal bkra chal na
lo rgyas so/ /lo rgyas lo rgyas na 'bum rdib bo/ /'bum rdib 'bum rdib na gam gum mo/ /gam gum gam gum na la lo'o/ /la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos so/ /bgrang 'phyos bgrang
'phyos na bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa'o/ /'grang 'phyos la bsgres pa bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa na/ dpag yas so/ /dpag yas dpag yas na dpag yas la bsgres pa'o/ /
dpag yas la bsgres pa dpag yas la bsgres pa na/ yal phyod do/ /yal phyod yal phyod na yal phyod la bsgres pa'o/ /yal phyod la bsgres pa yal phyod la bsgres pa na/ mu yal
lo| |mu yal mu yal na/ mu yal la bsgres pa'o/ /mu yal la bsgres pa mu yal la bsgres pa na/ bgrang yol lo/ /bgrang yol bgrang yol na/ bgrang yol la bsgres pa'o/ /bgrang
yol la 'gres pa bgrang yol la bsgres na/ mi 'jal to/ /mi 'jal mi 'jal na/ mi 'jal la bsgres pa'o/ /mi 'jal la bsgres pa mi 'jal la bsgres na/ bsam phyod do/ /
bsam phyod bsam phyod na/ bsam phyod la bsgres pa'o/ /bsam phyod la bsgres pa bsam phyod la bsgres na/ mtha' 'byams so/ /mtha' 'byams mtha' 'byams na/ dpag thag
go| dpag thag dpag thag na/ dpag thag la bsgres pa'o/ /dpag thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres na/ brjod du med pa'o/ /brjod du med pa brjod du med pa na/ brjod du med
pa la bsgres pa'o/ /brjod du med pa la bsgres pa brjod du med pa la bsgres na/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o/ /de'i mdun na bye ma'i phung
po chen po dpag tshad du ma'i tshad dang ldan pa zhig 'dug 'dug pa las 'di la bye ma'i 'bru 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes bya ba nas/ bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa
la bsgres pa 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes rab tu phye nas bgrang brtsis te grangs su bcad do/ /des bye ma'i phung po de rtsis kyi brdar bstan pas shin tu bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so//
rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa kun na'ang yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang
shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng
gi phyogs su'ang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming du bya ba/ gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa thams cad na'ang yod do/ /byang chub
sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming
gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i bskal pa'i ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig nas
gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / chos kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / sems can gyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa
dang | las kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa kun la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni/ phyogs bcu na ming
du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du rung ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ phyogs bcu na ming gcig
nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho bo pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba chos thams cad shes
par bya ba'i bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi grangs
la zhugs pa/ dus gsum gyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi phung po thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad kyi ming gi 'khor lo dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ spyod yul smos pa'am/
yul brjod pa'am/ stobs bsngags pa'am/ bsam pa bstan pa'am/ tshogs yongs su brjod pa'am/ smon lam bshad par bya ba'am/ spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'am/ pha
rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa mngon par brjod pa'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa'am/ yang dag par bstan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ ye
shes snang ba khod du chud par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya
ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas spu g.yos te/ dga' ba chen po'i shugs skyes nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan
par gyur pa/ ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa rin po che rab tu dkon pa thob pa/ 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i sems dang / bsam pas byung ba/ sangs rgyas skyes pa gcig nas gcig
tu brgyud par 'gro ba la dbang bsgyur ba/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la rten pa/ thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rigs rnam par phye bas 'byung ba bstan
pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi dbyings su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas gyi yul dang ldan pa/ bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi
snang ba chen po la dbang bsgyur ba khams gsum gyi khyim du sdud pa'i sgo shin tu gcod pa des/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u
dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
nor bzang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa byed cing / gangs chen mtsho ltar sprin chen po'i char gyis ngoms mi shes pa/ dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyi nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis/ dge ba yongs su smin par byas pa'i sa gzhi las dbang po'i myu gu 'thon cing skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i
gdams ngag gi 'od zer kyi dra bas/ lus dang sems shin tu tshim par byas pa/ dpyid kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdungs pa'i ri dwags kyi tshogs gsal zhing bsil ba'i gangs chu la
'thung bar 'dod pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa/ bung ba mang po 'khor zhing lding bas rgyas par gyur pa'i pad mo dang ldan pa'i pad mo'i
mtsho ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gis/ sems kyi me tog puN+Da ri ka kha bye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i rin po che'i gling ltar dge ba'i
bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag rin po che 'phel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byas pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing chen po me tog dang 'bras bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar
dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ klu'i dbang po chen
po rtsed mo dam pas rtse ba las byung ba'i nam mkha'i sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag thos pa'i tshogs su gyur pa'i rnang shin tu che ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum
pa'i 'jig rten gyis brgyan pa'i sna tshogs kyi spo ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i chos dri ma med pa sna tshogs brtsegs pa'i spor gyur pa /sum
cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i brgya byin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung
ba'i yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing zil gyis mi non la/ gzhan la zil gyis gnon pa de/ mthar gyis grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa gang na ba
der phyin te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ de la skye bo mang pos bstan te/ rigs kyi bu/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba de/ grong khyer gyi dbus
kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug go zhes nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i gnas gang ba der song ste/ thal mo sbyar nas sgo khang na sdod sdod pa dang /
des dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i khyim de shin tu rgya che la yangs shing rin po che'i ra bas yongs su bskor ba/ phyogs bzhi nas sgo shin tu mdzes pa rnam par phye ba/ rin po che tshad
med grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa mthong nas/ de khyim der song ste kun tu bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba/
na chung shin tu gzhon la/ thog ma dar la bab pa/ gzugs mngon zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog dam pa pri ya pa shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ skra phye mar bzhag pa/ lus
la rgyan med pa/ gos dang / smad g.yogs dkar po bgos pa/ rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par de'i lus sam/
sems kyi dbang ngam/ gzi brjid dam/ kha dog gis zil gyis mngon pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang med de/ lha'am mi'ang rung ste/ sems can gang gis dge bsnyen ma
phul du byung ba mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la ston pa'i 'du shes su bsam pa zhig /rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ngo / /gzhan
yang khyim de na/ stan lha rdzas dang / mi'i rdzas las shin tu 'phags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa bye ba stong phrag bcu bting ba dang /
mdun du phru ba gcig cig bzhag pa las kha zas dang / skom gyi bag gam/ gos dang / rgyan gyi longs spyod kyi bag gzhan ci'ang mi snang ngo / /
bud med stong phrag bcu tsam zhig mdun na 'dug par mthong na'ang / de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu mo'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul

dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i longs spyod dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul du shis pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin du gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyis
shin tu klubs pa/ lha'i bu mo'i skad lta bu'i dbyangs snyan pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de'i 'khor gyi bud med kyang / nges ci
bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing mdun na 'khod do/ /rim gro byed do/ /bkur sti byed do/ /gdong du lta'o/ /ci bsgo ba nyan cing gnas so/ /rje sar 'khod do/ /yongs su lta'o/ /rnam par
lta'o| |'dud do/ /rab tu 'dud do/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gi lus las spos kyi ngad ldang pas ni/ grong khyer de'i 'khor thams cad du dri zhim pos khyab par 'dug ste/ sems
can gang gis dri de tshor bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang gnod sems med pa'i sems dang / shar gnyer med pa'i sems dang / 'tshe ba med pa'i sems dang / phrag dog
dang | 'jungs pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / sgyu dang g.yo med pa'i sems dang / chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / zhum ba dang / gzengs mtho ba med pa'i sems
dang | byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / sdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang / gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la re ba med pa'i sems su gyur te/ gang gis de dag
gi skad thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / dul ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis de dag mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang 'dod chags dang
bral ba tsam du rang rang gis shes par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
te| dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ bdag
gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan
tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma/ ji ltar
byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/
rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las mos
pa sna tshogs can rnams/ kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis tshim par byed de/ rigs kyi
bu| de ltar kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis sems can brgya'ang yongs su tshim par byed do/ /sems can stong dang / sems can brgya phrag
stong dang / sems can bye ba dang / sems can bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can bye ba phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag
stong nas/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kyang / ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /yongs su
stob par byed do/ /yongs su dga' bar byed do/ /yongs su mgu bar byed do/ /yongs su spro bar byed do/ /shin tu tshim par byed do/ /yid bde bar byed do/ /'on kyang phru ba
'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med de/ 'grib pa med do/ /dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'bri bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sa mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar
thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /mur thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig
rten gyi khams gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ sems can mos pa sna tshogs can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'ongs kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /yongs
su dga' bar byed do/ /nyams bde bar byed do/ /shin tu tshim par byed do/ /yid shin tu bde bar byed do/ /'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med de/ 'grib pa med
do| |dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /sa mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /mur thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can mos pa sna tshogs can dang / bsam pa sna tshogs can thams cad 'ong bar gyur
na yang / de dag thams cad ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas yid bde bar bya ba'i bar du byed do/ /kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung
pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang /
phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang /
rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su
tshim par byed pa nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa gang ji snyed gcig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi 'bras bu
brnyes par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag
stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
'jig rten gyi khams na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / nyan thos
dang | rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu brnyes par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs
mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs na ji snyed
cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig
bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi
khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra pa snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po
byang chub la bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji
lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs
pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te/ bdud sde dang bcas pa rab tu pham par mdzad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong
dang | 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong

dang | 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling
bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra
ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ rigs kyi bu/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas
las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'phags ma/ bdag gis mthong ngo / /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ bud med 'di
dag la sogs pa brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu kho mo dang skal pa mnyam par spyod pa/ smon lam gcig pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa/ 'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa/ mos pa'i lam rnam par
dag pa gcig pa/ kho mo dang skal pa mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/ skal pa mnyam par blo rnam par dag pa/ skal pa mnyam par blo tshad med par gyur pa/ skal pa mnyam par
dbang po rab tu thob pa/ skal pa mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ skal pa mnyam par spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ skal pa mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/
skal pa mnyam par don nges par rtogs pa/ skal pa mnyam par chos kyi don ston pa/ skal pa mnyam par gzugs rnam par dag pa/ skal pa mnyam par stobs tshad med pa/ skal
pa mnyam par brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ skal pa mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ skal pa mnyam par dbyangs rnam par dag pa/ tshad med pa'i yon tan brjod du yod pas
rnam par spyod pa thams cad la skal pa mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la kha na ma tho ba med cing / rnam par dag pas bskal pa mnyam par las
kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa/ skal pa mnyam par byams pa chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed
pas mi skyo ba'i phyir/ skal pa mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byed
pa'i lus yongs su ston pas skal pa mnyam par lus kyi las rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig tha snyad la skal pa mnyam par ngag gi las rnam par dag pa/
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skal pa mnyam par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skal pa mnyam
par rgyu ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la skal pa mnyam par mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba
la skal pa mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa sha stag cig kyang yod de/ rigs kyi bu/ bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig gcig tu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la zhal zas yongs su dbul ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu rgyas par 'dong ngo / /phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing srid pa tha ma pa
dang | nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo / /phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing phyogs
bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ yi dwags kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho mo ni phru ba 'di nyid nas lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs
su tshim par byed do/ /klu rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis/ gnod sbyin rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi kha zas kyis/ dri za rnams ni dri za'i kha zas kyis/ lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi kha zas
kyis| nam mkha' lding rnams ni nam mkha' lding gi kha zas kyis/ mi'am ci rnams ni mi'am ci'i kha zas kyis/ lto 'phye chen po rnams ni lto 'phye chen po'i kha zas kyis/ mi
rnams ni mi'i kha zas kyis/ mi ma yin pa rnams ni mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ yud tsam zhig sdod dang / de'u re mngon du 'gyur ro/ /
dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas sngon gyi smon lam gyis pos pas/ sems can grangs med pa zhig shar
phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ sems can grangs med pa zhig lho phyogs dang / nub
phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur te/ de ltar 'ongs pa de dag dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas/ stan de dag la bkod de/ so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha
zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang ldan pas yongs su tshim par byas so/ /yongs su bstabs par byas so//
yongs su dga' bar byas so/ /yongs su mgu bar byas so/ /yongs su spro bar byas so/ /shin tu tshim par byas so/ /yid bde bar byas so/ /kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du
btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / phreng
ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing
rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yid
dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so/ /lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/ /klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyang / mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so/ /'on
kyang phru ba de las god par gyur pa med/ 'grib pa med/ dmas pa med/ zad par gyur pa med/ sa mtshams su gyur pa med/ mthar thug pa med/ mur thug pa med do/ /de nas dge bsnyen
ma phul du byung ba des/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan
ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtsho mi zad pas/ mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu
bsags pas nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge
ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung bas/ bsod nams chen po'i khor yug dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rin po che snyim pa nas char ltar 'thor bas/ bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur pa
chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed pas/ bsod nams chen po'i mdzod la mngon sum du lta ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi phongs pa'i mun pa sel bas/ bsod nams chen po'i sgron mar gyur pa de
dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag mkhas
ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan
du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar
g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i drung nas blta bas mi ngoms bzhin du song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/ bsod nams rgya mtsho de la ni rjes su sems/ bsod nams kyi nam mkha'
de la ni kun tu lta/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi ri bo de la ni mngon par 'dzeg /bsod nams kyi tshogs de ni yang dag par sdud/ bsod
nams kyi chu bo de la ni yongs su 'bog /bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni rab tu 'bab/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su sbyong / bsod nams kyi gter de la ni
yang dag pa blta/ bsod nams kyi tshul de la ni rjes su dran par byed/ bsod nams kyi chos de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi rgyud de ni yongs su sbyong ba byed cing / mthar
gyis grong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang / rnam par 'phel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
cad dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang / yongs su smin par
'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par yang dag par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas/ chos kyi snang ba yang dag pa
blang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu snang ba rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / khyim bdag mkhas pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer
gyi dbus lam gyi bzhi mdo zhig na/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la/ rin po che grangs med pa las byas pa'i khri/ nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang / in+d+ra nI la sna tshogs
kyis spras pa bkye ba/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma me pa'i snying po can rin po che lnga brgya tsam gyis gzugs legs par brgyan pa/
lha rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs bting ba/ gam yo na sa lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po bsgreng ba/ rin po che du ma'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/ rin po che'i bla re
chen po bres pa/ bla nas gser dang / rin po che'i me tog gi lda ldi mang po bkye ba zhig la 'dug cing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gdugs yu ba dri ma med pa bai DU R+Ya las byas
ba ni drung na bsgreng zhing bzung / rin po che'i g.yag rnga dri ma med pa'i rdul yab ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bus ni legs par g.yab/ spos kyi rim gro yo byad sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs
shing bsangs/ rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba lha rdzas kyi dbyangs las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam ni g.yas g.yon nas brdungs shing dkrol/ grong khyer 'byung ba
chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams shin tu dga' bar bya ba'i don du/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char ni kun nas 'bab par gyur/ g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam
sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba skal pa mnyam par spyod spyod pa/ ngag nyan cing ci dga' bar byed pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs
su grub pa/ lha dang mi'i gzugs las shin tu 'das pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / khyim bdag mkhas pa gang na ba der song
ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug
ste| thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag ni 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad shin tu bde ba
la dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas mngon par gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang dag par bskyal ba dang / sems
can thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan shin tu bskam pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying rje'i rlan yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang /
sred pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad 'khor
ba'i dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / chos la dga' zhing mos pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams
cad khams gsum gyi grong brdal nas gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzung par sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyis kyang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma
'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems
dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bslabs na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba bdag la bshad du
gsol/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas mi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro
bya bas sgyid lug pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid mi bde ba mi skyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal ba las phyir mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
gnyen la mos shing dad pa'i yid las rnam par mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta ba las phyir mi zlog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi tshul la
zhum pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya bas mi skyo ba de lta bu ni shin tu dkon no/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis kho bo'i 'khor 'di dag mthong ngam/
smras pa/ 'phags pa/ mthong ngo / /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di dag kun kyang kho bos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bdag ste/ 'di dag ni kho bos
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos pha rol tu phyin pas bstud de/ gsos pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag
ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnam par bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi rigs las gyen du bskyod pa'o/ /'di dag ni
kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las bzlog pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
ba la btsud pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du ltung ba las yongs su bzung ba'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong du chud par bya ba la bkod pa ste/ rigs
kyi bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams mang po thob
pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bo ni zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / ro dam pa 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dam pa dang / bza' ba
'dod pa rnams la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang / bldag pa 'dod pa rnams la bldag pa dang / mur pa 'dod pa rnams la mur ba dang / gos 'dod
pa rnams la gos dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / bdug pa 'dod pa rnams la
bdug pa dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / phye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye ma dang / rgyan dang lhab lhub 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang lhab lhub dang / rin po che 'dod pa rnams
la rin po che dang / gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la dngul dang / mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang / rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang /
stan 'dod pa rnams la stan dang / mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams la na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang / bzhon pa 'dod
pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / dga' ba 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba dang / glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ma he dang / ra lug 'dod pa rnams la
glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ma he dang / ra lug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan 'dod pa rnams la/ rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang /
ba dan dang / bran pho dang / bran mo 'dod pa rnams la bran pho dang / bran mo dang / 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor gyi byis pa dang / bud med 'dod pa rnams la bud med
dang | bu mo gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams la bu mo gzhon nu dang / cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che dang / thor pag dang bcas
pa'i gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la thor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che dang / skra mthon mthing dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa
rnams la/ skra mthon mthing dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa
byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ yud tsam zhig sdod dang / de'u re mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pas tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la/ sems
can grangs med pa zhig khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ phyogs tha dad pa dang / yul tha dad pa dang / gnas tha dad pa dang / grong khyer tha dad pa dang /
grong rdal tha dad pa dang / tshong 'dus tha dad pa dang / ljongs tha dad pa dang / 'khor gyi grong tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / sems can
gyi rigs tha dad pa dang / sems can rnam pa mi mthun pa tha dad pa dang / lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang / ming du bya ba tha dad pa dang / sems can skye mched
rnam par dag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ kha zas sna tshogs 'dod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba gtsang ba 'dod pa dang /
sha 'dod pa dang / kha zas rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang nas 'bras
chan dang / sran chan dang / 'khur ba dang / skyo ma dang / nya dang / sha la sogs pa/ kham gyis bza' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dang / mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro
ba'i rgyud thams cad rnam par spyod pa dag las kyang / kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa
thogs pa med par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag mkhas pa la slong
mo 'debs so/ /gdong du lta'o/ /sdod do/ /gsol ba 'debs so/ /de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas/ slong ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te/ nam
mkha' la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan
pa mang po 'thon te/ lag mthil du 'ongs par gyur to/ /des de dag yongs su blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i slong mo pa mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag ci 'dod
pa'i zas dang / btung ba'i rnam pa dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/ /ci 'dod pa yongs su byin no/ /rab tu dga' bar
byas so/ /shin tu tshim par byas so/ /dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so/ /nyams shin tu bde bar byas so/ /yid rab tu dga' bar byas so/ /de ltar de dag shin tu tshim par
byas nas/ des kyang mchog ste/ de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod de/ chos bstan to/ /phongs pa thams
cad 'byung mi srid pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / skyid pa chen po yongs su 'grub pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod
pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / dga' ba bza' ba'i zas rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan
dang / dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa'i lus 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / thub pa med pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su
brjod pa dang / bla na med pa'i kha zas yongs su shis pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs
mi zad pa rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu'ang yongs su brjod pa byas te chos ston to/ /de kha zas don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna
tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/ de dag la tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des btung ba
don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la/ btung ba mang po zhim pa kha na ma tho ba med pa/ yid shin tu dga' ba byed pa de dag gis tshim par byas nas/ de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor
ba la dga' ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des ro'i mchog don du gnyer
zhing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs mngar ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tsha dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bska ba rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su tshim par byas te/ de'i 'og tu
skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des bzhon pa don du gnyer zhing / phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la bzhon pa sna
tshogs kyi sbyin pas yongs su bstud de/ de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des gos don du gnyer cing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas
'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te/ nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs dang / sngon po
dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ kha dog sna tshogs can/ kha dog du mar rnam par dag pa dag 'thon cing /
lag pa'i mthil du 'ongs pas/ des de dag gi slong mo pa de dag la yongs su bstud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang / mdog
gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slong mo pa rnams la
bstud byas nas/ ci rigs su chos bstan to/ /de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas/
tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos
byang chub sems dpa' yo byad la dbang thob pa/ rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su khebs par byas
shing | sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu
'bebs pa/ de bzhin du rgyan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / cod pan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / khang pa brtsegs pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna
tshogs kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / ma tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos
kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam
pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i sprin gyi char dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas
su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi sprin gyi char
'bebs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ rnam par 'phrul pa bstan par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/
grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar
byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shing / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te/
mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la chos kyi rim gros slob ma'i tshul bstan te/ de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas
kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur bar yongs su blta zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de la rag lus par blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dben par sems
rgyun mi 'chad par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' shin tu nyan pa'i sems dang ldan par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du
'gyur ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang tshig mnyan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i dang pa'i dbang
po la bsam pa byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis btams te btang bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten cing bkur ba dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i sems
kyis khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang
bltas te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yid ches par sems/ bsod nams kyi zhing de la ni yang
dag par blta/ bsod nams kyi ri bo de ni yongs su sbyong / bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par 'dzeg /bsod nams kyi mdzod de ni rnam par 'byed/ bsod nams kyi
gter de la ni shin tu blta/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su spyod/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yang dag par len/ bsod nams kyi stobs de ni yongs su bskyed/ bsod
nams kyi shugs de ni rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / mthar gyis grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs gang na ba der phyin te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud yongs su tshol tshol ba
las| tshong 'dus kyi srang zhing na 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas
'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal na/ 'phags pa/ lam gang gis bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi man ngag legs par mi stsal tam/ de nas chos kyi tshong don rin chen gtsug phud kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu
nor bzang gi lag nas bzung ste/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der khrid de/ khyim de bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas/ des
bltas na khyim de dag cing 'od gsal la/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa ste/ yangs shing mtho la dngul gyis ra bas bskor ba/ shel gyi rtsig pas shin tu legs
par brtsigs te mdzes par byas pa/ bai DUR+Ya'i phung po brgya phrag stong gis rab tu brgyan pa/ mu sa ra gal pa'i ka ba bkye ba/ mu tig dmar po las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri
shin tu bshams pa/ nor bu rin po che rang bzhin snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa/ gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi
nor bus brgyan pas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/ asma gar b+ha las brtsigs pa'i rdzing bu chu bsil pas gang ba dang
ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis bskor ba/ rgya che zhing yangs pa/ rim pa bcur brtsegs pa/ shin tu mtho ba/ sgo brgyad dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong nas/
des khyim de'i nang du phyin te/ kun tu bltas na/ rim khang tha ma'i nang na/ bza' ba dang / btung ba'i rnam pa yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang gnyis pa'i nang na/ gos kyi
rnam pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang gsum pa'i nang na/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang lhab lhub yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang bzhi pa'i
nang na/ btsun mo'i 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad du bya ba/ bud med rin po che sa chen po'i steng na bzang du bya ba yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang lnga pa'i nang na/ sa lnga pa la
gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i dga' ba la mos pa/ 'jig rten la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gtsug lag thams
cad mngon par sgrub pa/ gzungs kyi tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin las rnam par ldang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa dang / ye shes kyi
snang ba mngon par sgrub pa 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo / /rim khang drug pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rab tu
thob pa/ shes rab shin tu zab pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i chos thams cad mngon par shes pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / snying po mang
pos sgo kun nas 'byung ba/ bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul can mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa/ chos yang dag par 'gro ba la rnam par 'phrul ba/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang / rab tu gsal bar byed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po yang dag par 'gro ba byed pa rnams kun
nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du ye
shes rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi g.yo ba'i gling zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdul dang bral ba'i 'od ces bya ba
dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad mos par byed cing / rjes su 'brang ba'i
dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho'i
snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms thob pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan
pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba zhes
bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi sprin la dmigs pas rim pas mi dmigs
pa'i gnas zhes bya ba dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo de dag la sogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang bar yang dag par
bgro ba byed cing / rgyan brjod du med pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar gyur te/ /rim khang bdun pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa'
sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin tu byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin
pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo / /rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma nyams par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du
lus shin tu rnam par phye ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas gud du mi 'phags pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku la yang dag
par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa sha stag kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong
ngo / /rim khang dgu pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / /rim khang bcu pa'i nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi
zhing dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa dang bcas pa dang / sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang
bcas par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa mnga' na/
phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa de/ ji lta bu zhig tu sbyang ba mdzad mdzad/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yongs su bskrun bskrun/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bos dran te/ 'das
pa'i dus kyi bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i yang pha rol gcig na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo sna tshogs zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa
chos kyi dbyings 'od zer mtha' yas pas yongs su brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla
na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ye shes rnam par snang ba la
sogs pa/ nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya dang / ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag stong dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug
rgyal pos spyan drangs nas/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis mdzes pa zhes bya bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de grong khyer du gshegs nas/
tshong 'dus kyi srang nas bzhud pa'i tshe/ kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sil
snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang phyung / spos kyi ri lu gcig gcig kyang bsregs te/ bdug spos kyis bsangs so/ /spos kyi ri lu gcig po
de de ltar bsregs pas/ zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang spos kyi na bun gyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas
yongs su khebs par gyur to/ /spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de dag las kyang sgra 'di skad du brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ dus gsum du dri ma med
pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ sgrib pa thams cad mi mnga' ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la yon phul ba thams cad kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i don chen po tshad med pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur
ro zhes de skad du kho bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de
las| sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
de yang / kho bos gnas gsum du yongs su bsngos te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar phongs pa thams cad shin tu rgyun gcad pa dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos
ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rin po che
tshad med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya mtsho dang tha mi dad pa la zhugs pa/ tha mi dad pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par 'dzin pa/ tha mi dad pa'i yon tan
rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad tha mi
dad pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun gcig tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha mi dad cing rnam par mi rtog par spyod pa/ dus gsum tha mi dad pas mnyam pa nyid la
zhugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad tha mi dad par yongs su gnas pas mi skyo ba/ kun tu lta ba tha mi dad pa'i yul gyi sa la gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod
par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul sba'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes
bya ba na/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba
dang | ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi
tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi drung nas
song ngo // //bam po dgu bcu lnga pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ chos kyi tshul mtha' yas pas mngon par
brlan pas shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa mtha' yas pa'i lam gyi rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po
mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjes su song ba'i
sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs yongs su skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis thub pa med pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyal
mtshan can/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/ mthar gyis
yul sba'i rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer kun nas sgo yongs su tshol zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / yul phyogs nyen kor kun dang / sgang dang / gshong
dang | mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa thams cad du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i bsam pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i sems dang / ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thub pa
med pa'i sems kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag ma brjed pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma nor bas sems rab tu bsgos pa dang / sgo
kun nas rnam par dmigs pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang / bag med pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mig dang rna ba g.yeng ba med par kun tu tshol tshol nas/ yul sba'i rtsa
pa'i dbus shig na/ grong khyer kun nas sgo tshong 'dus kyi rdul stong phrag bcu'i gnas su gyur pa de/ shin tu bzang po grub pa/ ra ba brtan
pas bskor ba/ shin tu mtho ba/ bzhi mdo brgyad kyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste/ de'i nang na spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba yang / spos 'tshong gi khyams shig na
'dug pa mthong nas/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba gang na ba der phyin te/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/
thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal to/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni sems can thams cad kyi nad shes te/ rlung las gyur pa dang /
mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / cha mnyam par 'khrugs pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa dang / mi ma yin pa las gyur pa dang /
dug 'thungs pa dang / sngags dang / mtshon dang / ro langs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs dang / me las gyur pa dang / chus bskyod pa las gyur pa dang / dngangs pa dang / 'jigs pa
sna tshogs las gyur pa thams cad kyang shes so/ /nad de dag thams cad zhi bar bya ba'ang shes te/ 'di ltar snum par bya ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /skyug par bya ba dang / bkru
ba dang / brta ba dang / gtar ba dang / sna'i cho ga dang / nyar dang / dugs dang / lums dang / byug pa dang / dug gso ba dang / 'byung po'i gdon med par bya ba dang /
bcud dang / khrus dang / bzhag pa dang / bskyed pa dang / kha dog sbyang ba dang / nyam bstod pa'ang rab tu shes te/ rigs kyi bu/ phyogs bcu nas sems can gang ji
snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar byed de/ nad sos nas kyang legs par bkru ba dang / lus la byug pas byugs pa byas nas
ci tshul gyi rgyan gyis yan lag shin tu brgyan te/ ci rigs pa'i gos lus la bskon nas/ kha zas bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas
te| nor dpag tu med pas kyang phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /de'i 'og tu yang de dag la mi gtsang ba bstan cing 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /byams pa
chen po yongs su bsngags shing zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /chos rnam par dbye ba'i bye brag bstan cing gti mug spang ba'i phyir
chos ston to/ /khyad par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi sgo yang dag par bstan cing cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi
yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam thams cad yongs su brjod cing / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad gzung du med
pa yongs su bstan cing / snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa yang dag par bsngags shing /
yon tan tshad med pa 'thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan cing / theg
pa chen po'i smon lam 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i spyod pa'i dra ba shin tu rgyas
par bshad cing / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags
shing mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag pa thams cad du 'gro ba thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod
cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thub par dka' ba yongs su ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
zil gyis ma non pa rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / chos kyi sku yongs su ston to/ /thabs mkhas pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sku gtsang zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
su brjod cing / bskal pa thams cad kyi dus su 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang 'grogs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su brjod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /ye shes kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par mdzad pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /mi dge ba'i chos thams
cad las rnam par ldog pa yongs su brjod cing / blta na phul du bzang ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /de ltar de dag chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdus te/ nor
dang rin po che mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas shing so sor 'gyed do/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni spos dang / bdug spos dang / bsgo ba dang / bsku ba
sbyor shes te/ 'di ltar spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sin+d+hu wa ra la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po mi pham pa la sogs pa dang /
spos kyi rgyal po rnam par gsal byed la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po nyi ma yod pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dus dang mthun pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi
rgyal po sprul gyi snying po'i tsan dan la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sprin gyi a ga ru la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dbang po mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa spos
sbyar ba thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod
pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs shes te/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod
pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'dis kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de'i mthus kho bo sems can thams cad yongs su skyob
pa'i rgyan gyi sprin byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ 'di ltar spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan nas/ rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya
ba'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi bar du byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni nam de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ kho bos sems
can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'di las spos kyi mdzod kyi khang pa
brtsegs pa'i sprin tshad gzung du med pa bton cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi dbyings
thams cad du spos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi khang pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ba gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan
dang | spos kyi rta babs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi skar khung gi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi pu shu'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi zla gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gdugs
kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi bla re'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra
ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi 'od kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan byin gyis rlob
ste| rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos
kyi gzugs kyi chos kyi sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur pa blta na don yod pa/ 'grogs na don yod pa/ rjes su dran na
don yod pa/ brtul zhugs rjes su byas na don yod pa/ ming thos na don yod pa/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam
gyis sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud las ldog par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la skabs bye ba thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba
tsam gyis sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams 'jigs pa dang / 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams
cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la rten par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba
mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams rga shi'i grog po dang / g.yang sar mi ltung ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas mya
ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod pa nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer
ta la'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po me zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la
spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun
tu lta ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sgo de dag rjes su dran par bya ba dang / bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ngo zhes rang gi sems yongs su tshim par bya ba dang /
bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bsrungs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro snyam du rnam par sems shing sems
dga' ba ni rab tu thob/ sems dang ba dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems rangs pa dang / sems mgu ba dang / sems mos pa dang / sems kyi shugs dang / sems
rnam par zhi ba dang / sems rgya chen po dang / sems rgyan dang / sems la thogs pa med pa dang / sems la sgrib pa med pa dang / sems rnam par phye ba dang / sems yang dag par
gzhol ba dang / sems kyi dbang dang / sems dbang bsgyur ba dang / sems kyi chos khong du chud pa dang / sems kyis zhing rgyas par dgang ba dang / sems sangs rgyas mthong bas brgyan
pa dang / sems stobs bcu'i yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'ang thob nas/ de mthar gyis ljongs nas ljongs dang / grong nas grong dang / yul nas yul du tshol zhing / grong khyer
ta la'i rgyal mtshan gang na ba der phyin te/ rgyal po me gang na bzhugs zhes dris na/ de la 'gro ba gzhan dag gis 'di skad du bstan te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di re/ rgyal po me ni/ rgyal po'i
don bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyal po'i 'phrin las mdzad do/ /khams rab tu skyong ngo / /chad pas gcad par 'os pa ni chad pas gcod do/ /bya dgas bsdu
bar 'os pa ni/ bya dgas sdud do/ /g.yon yod pa rnams la ni gyod rmod do/ /rtsod pa rnams kyi zhal che ni yongs su gcod do/ /dma' ba rnams ni dbugs 'byin to/ /dregs pa rnams ni/
'dul ba mdzad do/ /srog gcod pa las ni rnam par zlog go /ma byin par len pa dang ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad do/ /gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par
zhi bar mdzad do/ /brdzun du smra ba las ni phyir zlog pa mdzad de/ /phra ma'i tshig dang ni rnam par dbral bar mdzad do/ /zhe gcod pa'i ngag ni rgyun gcod pa mdzad do/ /tshig kyal ba las ni yongs
su glon no/ /chags sems dang ni mi 'dre bar mdzad do/ /gnod sems dang ni rgyang sring ngo / /log par lta ba ni 'dre ba med par mdzad do/ /de nas tshong dpon
gyi bu nor bzang rgyal po me gang na ba der phyin na/ des mthong ba/ rgyal po me de ni rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje mthu bo che'i nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ rin po che 'od gsal
ba rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa las byas pa'i rkang pa bkye ba/ rin po che gcig ma yin pas legs par spras shing brgyan pas yid du 'ong ba'i lhun dang ldan pa/ gser gyi lcag/
bod kyi dra bas legs par blas shing chub par btags pa/ nor bu rin po che du ma'i sgron mas shin tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i pad+mo'i snying
po can lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan rim pa du mar bting ba/ gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyis shin tu bdug pa/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba brgya stong gis
mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ba dan brgya phrag rnam par bres pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi chun po sna tshogs kyi lda ldi rab tu bkye bas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/
steng nas lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bla re sna tshogs bres pa zhig la 'dug cing / de ni gzhon zhing dar la bab pa gzugs mdzes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon mthing g.yas
phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can/ dpral ba yangs pa/ mig dkar nag 'byes shing ring la/ rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/
sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la/ ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar
ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge'i 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa/ mkhur ba shas rgyas pa/ smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod
spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/ rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing bzang pa/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes
pa| snying ga dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i stod ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dra bar 'brel ba'i sor
mo can/ rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ bral zlum pa/ pho mtshan
gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/
ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs gyen du 'khyil ba/ shing n+ya gro ha'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/
mgo la nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi cod pan thogs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa'i dpral ba'i rgyan zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ rna ba las rin po che in+d+ra nI
la'i rna cha dri ma med pa 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa'i se mo do'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/ dri ma med pa'i ro stod rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu dam pa'i
dpung rgyan dang / gdu bus lag pa mdzes par brgyan pa zhig ste/ rin po che'i gdugs chen po rin po che'i bai DUR+ya dri ma med pa'i yu ba can/ rin po che shar bu brgya phrag bcus rnam

par phye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bla gab can/ nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba rnam par dag pa'i snying po can/ rin po che'i dril bu'i phreng ba las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/
nor bu rin po che'i 'od phyogs kun tu 'phro ba can drung nas bzung zhing bsgreng ba/ rgyal po'i gzi brjid dang dbang chen po la gnas pa/ srid la gzhan gyi 'khor gyis gco ba med
pa| dgra'i 'jigs pa dang bral pa'i dbang phyug dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de'i 'khor kun nas kyang blon po stong phrag bcu tshogs shing rgyal po'i dgos pa sgrub pa la brtson/
pa mthong ngo / /de'i mdun na chad pas gcod pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma lta bu/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'khor lta bu/ 'jigs 'jigs lta'i gos gyon pa/ gtum zhing
mi bzad la 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa/ mig dmar ba/ so gtsigs pa/ gdong gi gnyer ma gsum khro gnyer du bsdus pa/ ral gri dang / sta re dang / lcags kyi changs mdung dang /
mda' dang / ber ga dang / mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha dang / lag cha thogs pa/ lus dang bzhin gyi dbyibs mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung ba/ sprin nag po ltar 'dug pa/ mi snyan
cing brlang la sdang ba'i sgra drag po 'byin pa/ gzi blta bar dka' ba 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa/ srog chags brgya phrag stong gi snying 'gems par byed pa de lta bu dag chad pas gcad
par 'os pa'i sems can chad pas gcod pa la brtson pa mthong ngo / /de na srog chags rku ba/ gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa/ sems can gyi longs spyod chud gson pa/ lam
sgugs shing 'phrog pa/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / lhas la mes gtong ba/ grong du chom po byed pa/ khyim phugs 'debs pa/ sdig sdig ltar byed pa/ dug
ldud pa/ bkrugs ma byed pa/ thong mi byed pa/ byi bo byed pa/ log par zhugs pa/ gnod par sems pa/ 'dod chen che ba/ sdig pa sna tshogs kyi las mi bzad pa byed pa
brgya stong mang po bcing ba dam po lngas bcings shing / rgyal po me'i drung du khrid pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de dag la'ang rgyal po mes ci rigs par chad
pas gcad par gyur pa mthong ngo / /des de na rgyal po mes bsgo zhing / la la ni rkang lag bcad/ la la ni rna ba dang sna bcad/ la ni mig phyung / la la ni yan lag dang
nying lag dang mgo bcad/ la la ni lus thams cad mes btang / la la ni ba tsha'i chu khol mas lus la gtor cing / pags pa brnyil ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i chad pa sna
tshogs du ma mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ brlang ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba/ srog 'phrog pa dag kyang byed par mthong ngo / /gsad pa'i sa de na yang / gsang ba'i rkang lag dang / rna ba
dang | mig dang / sna dang / mgo dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi phung po ri tsam du spungs pa mthong ngo / /khrag gi mtsho dpag tshad gsum tsam du zabs su zab la chu zheng
du dpag tshad du ma yod pa yang mthong ngo / /de na shi ba'i keng rus yan lag dang / nying lag dang / mgo dang bral ba brgya stong du ma la/ spyang ki dang / wa dang / khyi dang / bya rog dang / bya
rgod dang / khra dang / bya ku ra ra mang pos gang ste/ 'drad cing 'thog pa mthong ngo / /de la'ang la la ni kha dog gyur te/ sngon por gyur pa tsam/ la la ni rangs pa tsam/ la
la ni bam pa tsam/ la la ni 'bu zhugs pa tsam du gyur to/ shin tu skyi g.ya' zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo / /gsad pa de dag gsod pa'i tshe/ mi sdug pa cho dgur
byas pas na/ 'jigs 'jigs skad dang / snying rje rje skad du sgra 'byin cing / cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra chen po thos nas kyi g.ya' zhing mi dga' ba chen po bskyed pa/ sems can dmyal
ba chen po ris gzhom pa'i sgra lta bu yang thos so/ /des de ltar kha btags te brdungs pa dang / shin tu 'jigs pa'i drag shul mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to/ /bdag ni sems can thams
cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol zhing 'bad de/ dge ba'i bshes
gnyen rnams la dge ba ni ci zhig bgyi/ mi dge ba ni gang zhig spang zhes 'dri 'dri na/ rgyal po me 'di la ni dge ba'i chos kyang med de/ kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las la spyod pa/
yid kyi yongs su rtog pa shin tu gtum pa dang ldan pa/ sems can pha rol gyi srog gcad pa la zhugs pa/ sems can pha rol shin tu mnar ba la brtson pa/ tshe phyi ma la lta ba med
pa| ngan song gi g.yang sa'i gad kha na 'dug pa zhig na/ 'di las ci byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang thob par 'gyur ram snyam ste/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed de/ sems
can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la mngon par brtson pa/ snying rje rgya chen po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa de la/ steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las lha
mang pos bos pa/ rigs kyi bu/ drang srong rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag tu bya ba mi dran nam/ des gyen du nam mkha'i dbyings la
bltas nas dran no zhes brjod do/ /lha rnams kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la de ltar the tshom ma skyed cig /rigs kyi bu/ dge
ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yang dag pa ma nor bar ston gyi/ log pa ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pas spyod pa'i ye shes ni
bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can yongs su sdud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can
tshar gcod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can gzengs bstod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can yongs su spyod pa'i ye shes bsam
gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can yongs su skyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can 'dzud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can yongs su smin
par byed pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /song / rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dris shig
ces nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis lha'i ngag mnyan te/ rgyal po me gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po me
la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/
'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ /de nas rgyal po mes rgyal po'i bya ba byas te/ seng ge'i khri las
langs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang ta la'i rgyal mtshan du khrid do/ /de mthar gyis rang gi gnas su phyin nas/ tshong
dpon gyi bu nor bzang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du khrid de/ khri la bzhag nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga'i khyim dang longs
spyod la ltos zhes nas/ des bltas na/ khyim de rgya che zhing yangs la/ rin po che bdun gyi ra bas yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pas shin tu
mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od shin tu 'bar bas gzi brjid rab tu 'bar
