dga'| sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi bar yang dga'/
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang
bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brten par yang dga'/ sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par
gtor bar yang dga'/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar yang 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar
byang chub sems pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed pa legs so/ /
legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni spos thams cad shes te/ spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / bdug spos thams cad dang / bdug spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / byug pa
thams cad dang / byug pa sbyar ba thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / phye ma sbyar ba thams cad dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang shes te/ lha'i
spos kyang shes so/ /klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i spos kyang
shes so/ /nad gso ba'i spos dang / yid mi bde ba bsal ba'i spos dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa 'bar bar bya ba'i spos dang /
nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i spos dang / 'dus byas kyi dga' ba dang bde ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / 'dus byas thams
cad las skyo ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad yongs su sel ba'i spos dang / sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i
spos dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas spyad pa'i spos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par dgod pa'i spos kyang shes te/ kho bos spos de dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu'ang rab tu shes so/ /'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / 'grub pa dang / yongs
su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su spangs pa dang / rab tu sbyar ba dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / yul dang / mthu dang / las dang / rgyu yang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi'i
'jig rten na spos glang po'i snying po zhes bya ba/ klu yongs su 'khrug par byed pa yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gyis kyang / yul khams chen po thams cad spos kyi sprin gyi dra
ba shin tu stug pas kun nas khebs par gyur te/ zhag bdun du spos chu'i rgyun shin tu phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo/ /de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam/ gos la spos chu'i
rgyun de dag gis bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / me tog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang / lus su 'gyur ro/ /khang pa dang / gzhal
med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa gang du bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / me tog gser gyi kha dog lta bus rnam par brgyan par gnas so/ /sems can khyim gyi
nang na gnas par gang gis/ spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gis mngad pa'i dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / zhag bdun du dga' ba dang / mos pa chen pos yongs su
rgyas par 'gyur te/ lus dang sems la bde ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi lus la yang khams 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'am/ gzhan
gyis gnod par byas pa las gyur pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do/ /sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / mi bde ba yang mi 'byung ngo / /'jigs pa'am/ dngang ba'am/ bag
tsha ba'am/ yid 'khrugs pa'am/ gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/ de dag thams cad zhag bdun du dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te/ gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems su 'gyur
ro| |rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang / nyams bde ba skyes pa rnams la bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ rim la ya las 'byung ba'i tsan dan sa steng dam pa zhes bya ba yod
de| de lus la bskus na me'i 'obs su mchongs kyang tshig pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spos gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des rnga'am/
dung la bskus na/ de'i sgras gzhan gyi 'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ mtsho ma dros pa'i ngogs nas 'byung ba'i a ga ru nag po pad+mo'i snying po zhes bya ba
yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gcig gi dris kyang / 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas par gang bar 'gyur te/ sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams
cad kyang sdig pa la smod cing / sdom pa'i sems rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba
yod de/ de'i dri tshor na sems can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur te/ kho bo ni de dag la ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni 'khor los bsgyur
ba'i longs spyod kyi don du 'byung ste/ des bdugs ma thag tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas so/ /rigs
kyi bu| lha'i 'khor chos bzang po nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdugs ma thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi dri zhim po dran par 'gyur
ro| |rigs kyi bu/ lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i gnas na spos kyi rnam pa dag pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yod de/ des bdugs ma thag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad lha'i rgyal po
rab mtshe ma'i drung du 'dong ngo / /de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas chos kyi gtam bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na spos kyi rnam pa sin du ba ra
zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na/ spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams
cad rgyas par gang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu bab bo/ /rigs
kyi bu| lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su bdugs na/ zhag bdun
du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni spos sbyar ba de shes su zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems
dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad nas gyen du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad las
shin tu 'das pa/ ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang / gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ sgrib
pa med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / yul du ldan pa/ kun gyi gzhi'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas par srid
pa'i kun gzhi dang / gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos pa'am
kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa'am/ gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyud bstan par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid
na| grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mnyan pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i drung du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la
spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ spos 'tshong gi
tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang grong khyer khang pa brtsegs par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/ lam gyi gyen thur dang / lam
mnyam pa dang / lam gyi thag thug dang / lam rdul yod pa dang / lam rdul med pa dang / lam bde ba dang / lam mi bde ba dang / lam dog pa dang / lam gegs med pa
dang | lam 'khyug pa dang / lam 'khyug pa med pa la rnam par spyod de/ bltas nas 'dri snyam du bsams so/ /'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro ba
'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can la phan gdags pa'i lam gyi nan tan
gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad byams sdang dang / mthon dman du gyur pa'i g.yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan
tan las bsgyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs
kyi sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma bsal ba dang / chos kyi dbyings bsgribs pa med pa la gzhol bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs
pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni/ thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag lus so zhes/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin nas/ mnyan pa
dpa' bo yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na mnyan pa dpa' bo de tshong pa brgya phrag stong tsam dang / srog chags brgya
stong du ma gtam sna tshogs nyan par 'dong pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing / rgya mtsho'i gtam yongs su brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho sems can
rnams la ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang mnyan pa dpa' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags
pa| bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags
pa| ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi
bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ ye shes chen po 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu 'dri ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs
kyi rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling gi gnas su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / dbyer med pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang rgyud sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba'i ye shes kyi
lam 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa'i smon lam gyis shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs pa med
pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dba' rlabs kyis rnam par brgyan pa thams cad kyi rang
bzhin dang / tshul gyi lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / chos kyi phyogs dang / sgo thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag
par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'di 'dri ba legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs
kyi bu| kho bo ni rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su sbyong zhing gnas te/ rigs
kyi bu| kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can phongs pa rnams mthong nas/ de dag gi don du dka' ba spyod de/ de dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi
zang zing gis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /chos kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongs su tshim par bya'o/ /de dag la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag tu bstan par bya'o/ /
ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par spel bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongs su spel bar bya'o/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o/ /
snying rje chen po'i stobs nye bar brtan par bya'o/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya'o/ /'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu brtan par bya'o/ /sems
can rgya mtsho bsdu ba la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par bya'o/ /'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /sangs
rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la yang 'di dag gzud par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang / yid
la byed pa la brtson par kho bos rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang / bde bar brtson pas rgya
mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so/ /rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang / rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang / rin po che'i gtos thams cad kyang
rab tu shes so/ /klu'i gnas thams cad dang / klu 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas
thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / 'byung po'i bar chad rnam par zhi bar bya
ba yang rab tu shes te/ klong yod pa thams cad dang / klong thams cad bkol ba dang / dba' rlabs chen po yongs su spangs pa dang / chu'i kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'ang rab
tu shes so/ /nyi zla dang / gza' skar gyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang / nyin zhag dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig kyang rab tu shes so/ /phan tshun du 'gro
ba'i shol 'dums dang / bde mi bde dang / gru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang / gru bzur ba dang / gru phul ba dang / rlung brdo ba dang / rlung bskyed pa dang / gru
bsgyur zhing bzlog pa dang / gru rtod pa dang / gru gtang ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ rtag tu sems can gyi don
dang | dgos pa byed do/ tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pos lam bde zhing nye zhor mi 'gyur la/ mi 'jigs pa nas chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba dang / spro ba bskyed cing
bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas/ de dag rin po che thams cad kyis chog ste phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / phyir yang 'dzam
bu'i gling du 'gyed 'gyed kyang / rigs kyi bu/ kho bo'i gru ni nam yang bub pa'am/ nye zhor gyur ma myong ste/ sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang / sems can
gang gis kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhor 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya
mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /srid pa rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu
'thob bo/ /sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang
bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro/ /zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas
par dgang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i
rjes su'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin du'ang gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
par thar pa mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / rjes su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs zhes bya ba thob par zad na/ kho bos byang
chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi
chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi las rnam par rgyu ba/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs
su sdud pa'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa/ sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsrub pa/ dus
rgya mtsho thams cad dang tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dmigs shes pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbres
las mi 'da' ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba
yod de/ de na tshong dpon rgyal pa dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji
ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong
du mas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang blta sa nas/ gdong mchi mas bkang ste ngu zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas ma ngoms bzhin du mnyan pa dpa'
bo'i drung nas song ngo // //bam po dgu bcu bdun pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par
dgang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlan gyis mngon par brlan pa'i rgyud can/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po'i rgyan shin tu bsags pa/ nyon
mongs pa'i rdul dang / mun pa dang / dri ma dang / 'dam thams cad dang bral ba/ chos mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur med pa la
zhugs pa/ dge ba'i chos tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/ mi dge ba thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa'i mthu sngon du 'dor ba dang ldan pa/ byang
chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu byang ba/ rgya chen po'i bde ba rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer snang bas ma rig pa'i mun pa ma lus bar bsal
ba| thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bas blags pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas ba/ smon lam chen po'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi tshul
dang mthun pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang du thogs pa med par 'gro ba la
mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon par mos pa de/ grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba gang na ba der phyin te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa yongs su rmed cing tshol
tshol ba la/ grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba'i shar phyogs logs kyi 'dab gcig na/ shing a sho ka'i nags tshal rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i nang na/ khyim bdag
stong phrag du ma zhig gis bskor te/ grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongs su bgro zhing de las brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang / yongs su 'dzin
pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad shin tu gzhig pa dang / srid pa'i 'ching ba thams
cad gcad par bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo glegs gcag pa dang / the tshom dang / yid gnyis dang / nem nur gyi rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang /
g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa shin tu gdang ba dang / phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma yongs su sbyang ba dang / sems kyi mtsho shin tu gsal bar bya ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa la sems can
rab tu dgod pa dang / dad pa rnyog pa med pa'i stobs bskyed de/ sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bsngags shing sangs rgyas kyi chos
yang dag par blangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi
stobs yang dag par ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi gtam byed cing 'di lta ste/ byang chub tu sems
bskyed pa la mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis gtam de'i rjes chad chad du bsdad nas/ tshong dpon
rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ ring mo zhig tu btud nas/ chos la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /'phags pa/ bdag ni
nor bzang nor bzang zhes bgyi ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol na/ ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob par 'gyur ba dang / bslabs
nas kyang ci nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / gdul ba'i don la mngon du mos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi zhal blta ba las mi 'phang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba
dang | sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang / bskal pa thams
cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags pas
bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu
'phrul thob pa'i mthus/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su spyong ste/ da ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i sgo thams
cad du 'gro ba 'di la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i
gnas thams cad dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams
cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su gtogs pa thams cad dang / lha'i gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dang /
klu'i gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams
cad dang / grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / grul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang / yi dwags kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / yi dwags kyi gnas thams cad dang /
dri za'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jig
rten thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas thams
cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang / mi'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi'i gnas thams cad dang /
grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can gyi rgyud thams
cad du chos ni ston to/ /chos ma yin pa ni bzlog go /rtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do/ /'thab pa ni rnam par bzlog go /'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed do/ /g.yul du lhags pa
ni rnam par bzlog go /shags 'gyed pa ni zhi bar byed do/ /mdud par 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel to/ /bcings pa thams cad ni yongs su gcod do/ /brtson ra thams cad ni
mngon par 'dral lo/ /'jigs pa ni rnam par bzlog go /mi dge ba'i las kyi 'du byed ni rgyun gcod do/ /srog gcod pa las ni sems can rnam par bzlog go /ma byin
par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems
dang | log par lta ba las ni sems can rnam par bzlog go /mi bya ba thams cad ni byed du mi 'jug go /dge ba'i chos bya ba thams cad ni byed du 'jug go /sems can
thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob tu 'dzud de/ 'jig rten rnams rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / zhags pa 'thub pa thams cad la
gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
brjod cing bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to/ /rnam par 'god do/ /rab tu gsal bar byed do/ /brjod do/ /de bzhin
du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams kyi lha thams cad zil gyis mnan te chos ston to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin
du phyogs bcur yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag tu chos ston te/
sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to/ /sems can dmyal ba yang ston to/ /sems
can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi mi bde ba'ang ston to/ /byol song gi skye gnas kyang ston to/ /byol song gi skye
gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang / byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten
yang ston to/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal yang ston to/ /mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yang ston to/ /mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang
mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi dga' ba spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyang ston to/ /mi'i 'jig rten yang ston to/ /mi'i 'jig rten gyi lam kyi rgyud du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba
dang | sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston to/ de ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang ston to/ /'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten nub par
'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba dang / 'jig rten nas 'byung ba yang ston to/ /de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor
ba'i skyon rnam par bzlog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du mgo 'khor ba dang / sdug bsngal du gyur pa
yang dag par bstan pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rgyu ba'i bya ba yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / ldog pa'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad
smos pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad gnas kyi ming du bya ba rnam par bsgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas pa med pa mngon par bstan pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor
lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba shin tu brjod pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad mngon par shes pa/ zhing gi dbyings thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ kun du lta ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu thob pa /tshig gi lam
dang / sgra thams cad rnam par dmigs pa la shin tu gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa/ dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la
yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes la dbang bsgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa' bo sems can tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par bya ba lam
'dres pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i lce yangs shing srab la yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho'i
yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus sgyu ma lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis
pa'i spyod lam gyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus la gzhol ba/ dus gsum thams cad du rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad
med pa'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul
shu ma phyi ma'i mtha' na grong khyer ka ling+ka'i nags tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems
dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang
pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam

pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang mthar gyis yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ka ling+ka'i nags tshal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
bsgyings pa yongs su tshol zhing sems can kun la rmed pa'i tshe/ gang nas gang du song ba de dang der/ rogs pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo
dang | lam gyi sum mdo dag nas tshogs te rjes su 'brang ngo / /skyes pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bud med brgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang / rigs kyi bu/ 'de re/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam
par bsgyings pa ni/ grong khyer ka ling+ka'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa nyi ma'i mdog na/ sems can tshad med pa'i don du chos ston cing
'dug go zhes bstan to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu btsal te bltas na/ bza' shing gi ra ba de na/ shing zla ba shar ba
zhes bya ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyi kha dog can/ 'od kyi mdog dang ldan pa/ 'khor kun du dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs
pa mang po dang / lo ma'i shing yongs su 'gebs pa zhes bya ba/ gdugs kyi rnam pa dang / dbyibs su 'dug pa'i 'dab mas kun nas khebs pa/ bai DUR+ya sngon po'i kha dog ltar
'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang / me tog gi shing me tog gi mdzod ces bya ba/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i
dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyis kun nas 'du ba dang / sus kyang
mi shigs pa lta bu mang po dang / shing tog gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro dpe med pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs zhes bya ba/ gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu shing tog
phun sum tshogs par gnas pa mang po dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas
kyi rin po che'i phreng ba dang / se mo do dang / rgyan rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che kha dog grangs med pa'i
'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang / gos kyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'phyang bas shin tu
brgyan pa mang po dang / rol mo'i shing dga' ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba/ lha rdzas las kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa mang po dang / spos kyi shing
kun tu zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ phyogs thams cad du thogs pa med par rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba mang po dag kyang yod par mthong / mtshe'u dang /
lu ma dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi pha gus mtha' brtsigs pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them skas btsugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang
mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi dri zhim pos bskus pas kun nas bskor ba/ gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUR+ya sngon po las legs par blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bye ma
bdal ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu lha rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ong ba can gyis yongs su gang ba/ rin po che'i pad+mo dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mud dang / me tog pun da ri ka kha
dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi bsung dang ldan pas chu kun nas yog pa/ bya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /sgra snyan pa 'byin
cing brjod pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas yongs su bskor cing brgyan pa dang ldan pa/ shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung thams
cad du'ang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa du mas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan rin po
che sna tshogs 'brel bar bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos dang / bdug spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis bdugs pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin po che
mngon par dpyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bkye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs dang / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa/ rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba yid
du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa mang pos brgyan pa/ 'khor du lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan brgya stong phrag du ma bting zhing bshams pa mthong ngo / /rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng
ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo snying po can bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi rgyal po'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng

ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i bya la'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams
pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs rnam par

snang ba'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i rdo rje'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri

rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po mdog dkar po'i pad+mos snying po byas
pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang zhing / rgya mtsho chen po ltar rin po che'i gling gis yongs su gang ba mthong
ngo| |bai DUR+ya sngon po'i dam pas spras te/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa'i phyogs ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam yang / gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i tshe/ mtho dman med pa

rdo rje rin po che'i mchog gi pad+mo dri yid du 'ong bar zhim zhing reg na bde ba'i sil ma kun tu bkram pa/ ngang ngur dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / kun la dang / ka la ping+ka dang / ko ki la dang / dzi
ban dzi ba ka sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro 'byin pa mang pos gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal shin tu legs par 'grigs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/
rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i sprin gyi char dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i char rgyun du 'bab pa/ 'bres pa'i nags tshal las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/ rin po che sna
tshogs kyi khang bu brtsegs ma rgyan par bkod pa'i nang nas/ spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos rin thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing zhim pa/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang po'i rgyan las kyang
lhag pas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis kun tu bres pa/ mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang / lda ldi kun nas bres
pas rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gser gyi dra ba 'bar bas kun nas dkrigs pa/ rol mo'i shing dang / rin po che'i ta la las dril
bu'i dra ba rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe tshul shin tu bzang ba rnams kyis/ glu snyan

pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba blang ba/ lha rdzas kyi yid bzhin gyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog dang / mdog sna tshogs su
ldan pas blta na gtang mi bra ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang ltar blta na bzang ba/
rin po che sna tshogs rnam par phye bas rnam pa thams cad du brgyan pa'i gdugs shin tu legs pa rnam par bsgreng zhing bkram pas kun nas blta na mdzes pa/ dbang po chen po'i 'jig
rten ltar shin tu mdzes pa'i de'u sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po rtag par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang ltar nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po

'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyis 'bar ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba de/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs che
zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs shing tshad med de/ rgya chen po dang ldan par mthong ngo / /de nas tshong
dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ de ltar yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshogs pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba'i rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa/ 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po las skyes pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing / rim gror byas pa'i rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad

na yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas mi 'phrogs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams dri ma med pa rgya chen pos grub cing byung ba/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang / rgyu mthun pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis byung ba/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/ mu stegs can
dang | phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bltar med par mthong ste
shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la'ang / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa lus shin tu mdzes pa/ spyod lam zhi ba/ dbang po
zhi ba| yid zhi ba/ shin tu dben pa/ dbang po thul ba/ glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dwangs shing gsal la rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po yid
bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa/ pad+mo la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang / skyi g.ya'i ba med pa/ mi 'jigs
pa rnam par dag pas ri'i dbang po chen po ltar mi sgul ba/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po ltar 'gro ba'i sems tshim par byed pa/ kha ba'i tsan
dan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sman gyi rgyal po blta na bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar byed pa/ chu'i lha'i zhags pa
ltar blta na don yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ltar lus dang sems kyi bag yangs bde ba bskyed pa/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi
kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po nor bu chu 'dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dwangs par byed pa/ zhing gshin pa ltar dge
ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug par mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste/ 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po la sogs pa
gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa mi zad pa yang dag par 'byed pa zhes bya ba
yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam
par bsgyings pas/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gzhi kun nas 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la
sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu/ lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i bsam
pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i
lha'i bu/ lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo chos thams cad dge bas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag
par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu/ lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang
bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rang gi sems kyi mdzod kyi klong zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i
rgyal po rab mtshe ma la sogs pa lha'i bu/ lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rgyan mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yang dag par
bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu/ lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge

slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings bas/ chos kyi sgo skyo ba'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni klu'i rgyal po gangs chen mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'od
brgya pa dang / dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / shugs ldan dang / ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang yul gyi 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni
rgyal po chen po ngal bso po la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/

chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po la sogs pa dri za mang po dri za'i bu
mo dang | dri za'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo dga' ba mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa zhes bya ba yang dag par
bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan na la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong
ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni nam mkha'
lding gi dbang po shugs 'dzin chen po la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo dang / nam mkha' lding gi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong
ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo srid pa'i rgya mtshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la
sogs pa mi 'am ci'i dbang po/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings
pas| chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po khro gnyer gdong la sogs pa lto 'phye
chen po'i bu mo dang / lto 'phye chen po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas la dga' ba skye zhes bya ba
yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo brgya stong mang po 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos
kyi sgo khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu mdangs 'phrog sdong po'i rgyal po la sogs pa srin po'i
dbang po/ srin po'i bu mo dang / sprin po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo snying rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag
par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo ye shes khyad
par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam
par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya chen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi bstan la la la ni sems can theg pa chen po la mos pa
rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo kun du sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni
byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi phung po
zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni sbyang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/
ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi bstan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod
cing | dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa
bzhi pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs kyi yul 'byung ba
zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting
nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya bas yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /
dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa'
sa bdun pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sogs kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan
la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin tu rnam par phye
ba'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings
pas| chos kyi sgo mi dmigs pa'i stobs kyis gnas kyi sa bstan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa
rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sgrib pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la
ni lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /de
ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongs su smin pa rnam par 'dul ba/ snod
du gyur pa ji snyed cig bza' shing gi ra ba der 'ongs shing / 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa/ mos pa mi mtshungs pa/ bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar gyur pa/ dad pa'i
ro rngam chen po dang ldan pa rnams la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ci nas kyang thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de
ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa des/ kun du lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
cad shin tu bstan pa la sogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa la sogs pa dang / sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la
sogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la sogs pa dang / khyad par yod pa'i rgyan la sogs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying po la sogs
pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dang / sems kyi mdzod la sogs pa dang / kun du mos pa mngon par sgrub pa'i snying po la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
sgo brgya stong grangs med pa non pa'i phyir te/ bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der/ byang chub sems dpa' ma/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig /dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings
pa la blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / sngon dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa la shin tu bkod pa
nas| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du byas pa sha stag go/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings
ba'i bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'chag sa phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs
spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa
phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos nas/ chos kyi sprin gyi char chen pos sems mngon
par brlan pa de'i yid la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyi/ da ni g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma zhig tu
bya'o snyam pa dang / de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas
so| |de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ skor ba byed pa'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'dug pa mthong nas/ mdun du 'dug
ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na
'phags ma/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/
rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes bya ba thob pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni ye shes snang ba ste/ dus gsum du byung ba'i rgyan sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par
dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma/ ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ye shes snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang yongs su sgrub pa'i tshe/
chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/
byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thams cad re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod

pa rnam pa tha dad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste/ 'di ltar lha'i lus dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma

yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i dbang po lus me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sbos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdug spos
kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phreng ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byug pa'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phye ma'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / na bza'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /

gdugs kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ba dan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i lhab lhub kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i

dra ba'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i sgron
ma'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa mang pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du yum gyi skur gshegs pa dang / bltam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /
mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing / snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang / chos
kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa yongs su
tshim par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar de dag thams cad la'ang / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam pa de lta bu dag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing / de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o/ /sems can gang gis kho mo sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa'i las 'di shes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la yang / kho mo ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid ston te/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ye shes kyi mig gis sems can thams cad la blta'ang sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed
la| rlom sems kyang mi byed do/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho yang nyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas rlom sems su byed pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus yongs su shes pas rlom sems su byed pa'ang med de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin kyang / chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pas

rlom sems su byed pa med do/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs kyang chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mos ni byang
chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad la
rlom sems med par gnas kyang skyil mo krung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang / skad cig gcig gis de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/ lus la sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'byung zhing rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ba spu'i nyag ma gcig gis spams shing
mngon par 'phen pa/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gar 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa/ skad cig gcig la bskal pa brjod
du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas pa mnyan pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa/ skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/
yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul bgrod dka' ba na/ grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bcom pa
ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de
nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang du bltas te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems
snang bar gyur pa de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba de la ni sems/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rjes su lta/ sems can thams cad kyi skad rnam par
dmigs pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul de ni shin tu rgya che bar byed/ snying
rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar ston/ chos thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs de la ni
rab tu rtog/ chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brang / chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'od de ni
shin tu gsal bar byed/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par sgrub/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam

dang dran pa thams cad nye bar blangs pas brtsams pa mthar dbyung ba'i smon lam de ni yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / mthar gyis yul bgrod dka' ba'i grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan gang na ba der phyin te/
bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang / de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la/ ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi tshul la mi mkhas pa'i mi ji snyed pa

de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ mi 'di de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan la/ de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te/ de ltar 'khrul pa med cing / de ltar yid 'khrug pa med la/ de ltar gnya' shing gang
tsam du lta ste/ de ltar gnod pas mi tshugs shing / de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yeng ba med ba'i mig dang ldan te/ yid la brel ba med cing / bsam pa zab la
mngon par mdzes te/ rgya mtsho ltar 'dug cing sems mi nyams mi 'khrug pa de la/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas ko ci zhig bya/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba med de/ sems phyin ci
log dang ldan yang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'khol kyang mi srid do/ /'di lta
bu dag ni bud med kyi dpang du 'gyur ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi yul la chags pa med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du
bying yang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med de/ mi dgos pa byed kyang mi srid do snyam mo/ /gang yang bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par
mngon par shes shing / ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la yongs su dri bar sems pa ni/ khyod kyang
thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas su smon pa'o/ /khyod ni bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnas su bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o/ /khyod ni nges
par sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dbyung bar 'dod pa'o/ /khyod ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtor bar 'dod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'de re/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes
gnyen ma ni grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na rang gi khyim na 'dug go /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis tshig 'di thos nas/ dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la

tshim zhing / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i khyim gang na ba der phyin nas/ de'i khyim che zhing yangs la rin po che'i rab rim pa bcus bskor ba/ rin po che'i ta la'i phreng ba rim
pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'obs spos chus gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mud dang / me tog pun da ri kas chu yongs su khebs pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
chus yongs su gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi bye ma 'dal ba/ spos yid du 'ong ba dang 'dres pa'i chu dri zhim pos gang ba/ rin po che sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po

che thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pas rnam par dkrigs shing / ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam dang / seng ge'i shing
thags dang / snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dgar bai DUR+ya sa
spras pa'i g.yi dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos zhim po thams cad kyis 'khor thams cad nas bdugs shing bsangs pa/ a ga ru nag po mchog gi bdug spos kyis dri zhim par bdugs

pa| spos kyi byugs pas 'khor kun nas byugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kan gyis rtsig ngos kun du bres pa/ steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu spras pas
kun nas bkab pa/ gser gyi dril gyi dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa 'byung ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin
sil ma kun tu bkram pas rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas sgo shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra
ba snang ba mu med par brjod du yod pa/ rin po che byu ru'i sdong po dang / rdo rje dang / man shel la sogs pa'i gter brgya stong kun gyis shes pa phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang
ldan pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste/ de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma/ gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa/ gya nom pa'i kha dog dam
pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can/ skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam par grub pa/ 'dod
pa'i khams kyi lha dang / mi thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/
sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs can/ rnam par thar pa yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/
bzo dang gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par byung ba/ chos kyi ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par bslabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang tshul rnam pa thams cad du thob pa/ rin po che'i lhab
lhub sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i
rgyan dang / lhab lhub grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pas lus shin tu 'bar ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa/ rin bo che bai DUR+ya'i phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rje
rin po che sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba mgul na thogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa la bskal pa mthun pa dang / smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po
gzhan gyis mi phyed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ des khyim de dag thams cad
dang / rin po che'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus bde ba dang sim pa skyed pa/ sems khong nas
dga' bar byed pas gsal zhing snang bar byas pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te
mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar
byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams
ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba
'phags mas bdag la bstan du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba thob ste//
rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho mo ni lha rnams la lha mo'i gzugs dang / /ba dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang / rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin
du snang par byed do/ /de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la
yang bud med kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng lhag par 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do/ /sems can gang 'dod
chags kyis kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag kho mo'i drung du 'ongs na yang / de dag thams cad la kho mo ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos ston te/ de dag gis chos
de thos nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod
chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob
par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni lag nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob
bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam
gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bral bas snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis/ 'dod chags
dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par brgyan ces bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni glal ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral
ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phas kyi rgol ba rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni mig btsums pa tsam gyis
'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni pang du khyud pa tsam gyis 'dod
chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud cing mi gtong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni 'o
byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba yang rab
tu 'thob bo/ /de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ji snyed cig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar
phyin pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa chags pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de/
khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/ 'phrin las ni ji lta bu zhig bzhugs/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mos dran na 'das pa'i dus shig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med par skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang
mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa de/ sems can rnams
la thugs brtse ba'i sku don du/ rgyal po'i gnas sgo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas/ sgo'i them pa la zhabs kyis non pa'i tshe/ grong khyer de thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas/
yangs shing rgya che la/ rin po che du ma las byas par yongs su grub par gyur te/ steng gi bar snang yang rin po che mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i me tog sna
tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin tshad med par rgya che bas khebs par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo
yang de'i tshe/ tshong dpon gyi chung ma zhig tu gyur te/ blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o/ /de nas kho mo cho 'phrul gyis yang dag par bskul nas/ khyim thab dang lhan cig tu dong dong ste/
de bzhin gshegs pa grong bar gyi srang du gshegs pa la dad pa rgya chen po skyes te/ kho mos rin po che'i dril bu gcig cig phul lo/ /de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
yang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa'i zham 'bring na 'dug ste/ des kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub
sems dpa'i thabs dang / ye shes mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/ bsod nams rgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi yul la thub pa med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes
pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag nan khugs
zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen

ma'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin par khyim bdag nan khugs kyi khyim gang na ba der phyin nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa
gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi
ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ /des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bo'i sems
kyi rgyud las ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang / sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma gtogs par/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang shin tu mya ngan
las 'da' ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba
med do| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang gi sgo 'byed pa ste/ kho bo mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed 'byed pas/
byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid la sems kyi skad cig skad cig tu mnyam
par gzhog ste/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la'ang khyad par gyi rnam pa du ma rab tu 'thob bo/ /smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ting nge 'dzin de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi
bu| kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ bsod skyabs la sogs pa de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dang / gser thub dang / log par dad sel dang / thams cad mnga' ba dang / gtsug tor can dang / rnam par gzigs dang / rgyal dang / rdzogs mdzad dang / grags mchog
dang / pad+mo'i bla la sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas mthong ba'i mtshams 'brel bas/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis
mngon sum du mthong ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs

rgyas brgya phrag stong yang mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas
bye ba khrag khrig dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dung phyur dang / sangs rgyas bye ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig
nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong
ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go /thugs dang po bskyed pas thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go /smon lam rnam
pa tha dad pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go /spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go /pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa la'ang 'jug go /byang chub
sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la'ang 'jug go /bzod pa brnyes pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go /bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu
phyung ba la'ang 'jug go /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan la'ang 'jug go /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par mdzad pa
rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go /sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go /'khor kun nas 'dus pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go /'od kyi dkyil
'khor rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gis mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jug go /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho
'phrul la'ang 'jug go /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa'ang shin tu rnam par gsal ba dang / ma 'dres par dran te yang dag par 'dzin to/ /dran pas yongs
su bcangs so/ /rig pas rab tu shes par byed do/ /blo gros kyis shin tu rnam par 'byed do/ /blos rtogs par byed do/ /shes rab kyis snang bar byed do/ /ma byon pa'i sangs
rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa byams pa la sogs pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems
kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa
yang shin tu gsal ba dang / ma 'dres pa rjes su dran te/ yang dag par 'dzin to/ /dran pas yongs su bcangs so/ /rig pas rab tu shes par byed do/ /blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do/ /
blos rtogs par byed do/ /shes rab kyis snang bar byed do/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu
brgyud pa mthong zhing shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi de bzhin
gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ thams cad kyang shes shing mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
pa la'ang 'jug go /sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de la'ang rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / mi zad pa dang / dad pas shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson
'grus dang / zhe non pas khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang / nyan thos
dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de'i yul la ma zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par shes shing khong du
chud par byed do/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa/ gcig nas gcig tu
brgyud pa thams cad kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong zhing shes so/ /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang
mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du'ang mthong ste/
nam de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig gi zhal blta bar dga' ba de'i tshe'ang de bzhin du mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa dang / bstan pa
mdzad pa dang / bstan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'dzin to/ /dran pas yongs su bcangs so/ /rigs pas rab tu shes par
byed do/ /blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do/ /blos rtogs par byed de/ /shes rab kyis snang bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs
su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig gcig tu shes pa rab tu thob pa/ skad cig gi cha shas la ting nge 'dzin
rnam par phye ba la spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma las byung ba/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i
ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa/ bdag dang / sems can dang / sangs rgyas mi gnyis par spyod pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi
'khrul 'khor gyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'gengs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang mi 'gal bar rnam par spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par rtogs par
byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul can de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon
tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ ri gru 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba
'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig ces nas/ de'i tshe tshigs
su bcad pa 'di gnyis smras so/ /song shig nor bzang dpal gyi chu rgyal dbus zhig na/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod/ /rin chen rgyus
byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang / /bza' shing ra ba rdzing dang chu bran 'bab par ldan/ /ri mchog de la brtan pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i
don du rnam par spyod/ /de gan song dang nor bzang khyod la mgon po yis/ /yon tan rgya chen tshul la 'jug pa ston par byed/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ khyim
